verb advance; go forward; forge ahead 列车前进在京广线上。 Lièchē qiánjìn zài Jīng-Guǎng xiàn shàng. The train proceeded along the Beijing-Guangzhou track. 我们不能停留在已有成绩上, 要继续前进。 Wǒmen bùnéng tíngliú zài yǐ yǒu chéngjì shàng, yào jìxù qiánjìn. We can’t rest on our laurels; we must forge ahead.
noun (traffic) lane; roadway 快(行)车道 kuàichēdào fast lane 慢(行)车道 màn chēdào slow lane 外车道 wàichēdào outside lane 机动车车道 jīdòngchē chēdào motor lane 四车道公路 sì chēdào gōnglù four-lane highway

verb arrive; reach 代表团于今晨到达广州。 Dàibiǎotuán yú jīnchén dàodá Guǎngzhōu. The delegation arrived in Guangzhou this morning. 按现在的速度, 我们三点以前可以到达。 Àn xiànzài de sùdù, wǒmen sāndiǎn yǐqián kěyǐ dàodá. We can get there before three o’clock at this speed.
noun baked cake 芝麻烧饼 zhīmashāobing baked sesame seed cake
noun large Chinese pizza
noun sword; sabre; rapier; épée; foil 剑柄 jiànbǐng handle of a sword; hilt 剑鞘 jiànqiào scabbard; sheath 剑手 jiànshǒu swordsman 剑坛 jiàntán fencing circles 剑舞 jiànwǔ sword-dance
noun hunter; huntsman

verb keep; maintain; preserve 保持警惕 bǎochí jǐngtì maintain vigilance; be on the alert 保持体形 bǎochí tǐxíng keep one’s figure 保持中立 bǎochí zhōnglì remain neutral; maintain neutrality 保持跳高纪录 bǎochí tiàogāo jìlù retain the high jump record 保持冷静的头脑 bǎochí lěngjìng de tóunǎo keep a cool head; keep one’s nerve; keep calm 跟群众保持密切联系 gēn qúnzhòng bǎochí mìqiè liánxì keep close to the people
noun picnic verb have a picnic
picnic blanket
noun blanket
noun peanut; groundnut The flower gives birth to a ...
1 to be familiar with 2 to know well

verb 1 be (or fall, lag) behind 落后二十年 luòhòu èrshí nián be 20 years behind 谁也不甘心落后。 Shuí yě bù gānxīn luòhòu. Nobody is willing to be left behind. 他的思想落后于时代。 Tā de sīxiǎng luòhòu yú shídài. His thinking is behind the times. 上半场主队落后一分。 Shàngbànchǎng zhǔduì luòhòu yī fēn. The home team trailed by one point at half time. 虚心使人进步, 骄傲使人落后。 Xūxīn shǐ rén jìnbù, jiāo'ào shǐ rén luòhòu. Modesty helps one move forward, whereas conceit makes one lag behind. 2 (of work) lag behind schedule adjective backward; behind the times (opp. 先进) 落后的生产工具 luòhòu de shēngchǎn gōngjù outmoded production tools 改变山区落后面貌 Gǎibiàn shānqū luòhòu miànmào put an end to the backwardness of the mountainous areas

verb 1 turn 往左拐 wǎng zuǒ guǎi turn to the left; make a left turn 2 limp; lame 他一拐一拐地走着。 Tā yī guǎi yī guǎi de zǒu zhe. He limped along. or He walked with a limp. noun 1 dialect corner; turning 墙拐 Qiáng guǎi corner of the wall 2 spoken form for the numeral 七; seven noun crutch 走路架着双拐 Zǒulù jià zhe shuāng guǎi walk on crutches verb 1 swindle; make off with 拐款潜逃 guǎi kuǎn qiántáo abscond with funds 2 abduct; kidnap

noun corner; turning verb (-//-) 1 turn a corner; make a turn 拐弯要慢行。 Guǎiwān yào mànxíng. Slow down at the corner. 往前走, 向左一拐弯就到了。 Wǎng qián zǒu, xiàngzuǒ yī guǎiwān jiù dàoliǎo. Go straight ahead, turn left and you’ll be there. 2 change one's opinion; pursue a new course; come round; think things through 他思想一时还拐不过弯儿来。 Tā sīxiǎng yīshí hái guǎi buguò wān r lái. He hasn’t straightened out his thoughts yet. or He is still not convinced. 他话说得离题太远, 不容易拐过弯儿来。 Tā huà shuō de lítí tài yuǎn, bù róngyì guǎi guò wānr lái. He strayed too far from the point, and couldn’t focus again.
Turn right
noun barbecue verb barbecue 烧烤羊肉 shāokǎo yángròu barbecue mutton
noun sweat; perspiration 汗如雨下 hànrúyǔxià dripping with perspiration
noun close (or bosom) friend

adjective shared; common 共同关心的问题 gòngtóng guānxīn de wèntí matters of common concern; issues of common interest 有共同之处 yǒu gòngtóng zhī chù have sth. in common adverb together; jointly 共同努力 gòngtóng nǔlì make joint efforts 共同行动 gòngtóng xíngdòng act in concert
1 identical 2 same
noun Internet cafe; cybercafe
adjective wild; undomesticated; uncultivated; feral

verb 1 affirm; confirm; approve; regard as positive (opp. 否定) 肯定成绩 kěndìng chéngjì affirm one’s achievements 他的设计得到了总工程师的肯定。 Tā de shèjì dédào le zǒnggōngchéngshī de kěndìng. His design was approved by the chief engineer. 2 be sure; have no doubt 他今天来不来, 我不能肯定。 Tā jīntiān lái bù lái, wǒ bù néng kěndìng. I’m not sure whether he will come today. adjective 1 positive; affirmative (opp. 否定) 肯定的判断 Kěndìng de pànduàn positive assessment 他的回答是肯定的。 Tā de huídá shì kěndìng de. His answer is in the affirmative. 2 definite; certain 肯定的答复 kěndìng de dáfù definite answer adverb certainly; undoubtedly; definitely 肯定按时送到 Kěndìng ànshí sòng dào guarantee punctual delivery 情况肯定对我们有利。 qíngkuàng kěndìng duì wǒmen yǒulì. The situation is undoubtedly in our favour.
noun handle; grip; knob 猛拧门把手 Měng níng mén bǎshou wrench at the door knob
verb hold or attend a meeting 我去开会。 wǒ qù kāihuì. I’m going to a meeting. 他正在开会。 Tā zhèng zài kāihuì. He’s at a meeting.
verb go mad (or crazy); become insane; be out of one's mind
1 result 2 effect 3 efficacy 4 (theater) sound or visual effects
noun handbag; small leather bag
adjective honest 诚实可靠 chéngshi kěkào honest and dependable 诚实劳动 chéngshi láodòng honest work
noun distinguished guest; honoured guest; welcome guest
1 partial towards sth 2 to prefer 3 to incline 4 erroneous tendencies (Leftist or Revisionist deviation)
a Lolita (young, cute girl)
pattern, model, type; law; mold

adjective 1 busy; fully occupied (opp. 闲) 忙里忙外 mánglǐ-mángwài bustle around 忙于工作 máng yú gōngzuò busy working 忙得团团转 Máng de tuántuánzhuàn run round in circles; extremely busy 忙了一整天 máng le yī zhěngtiān be busy all day 2 imperative; anxious 不慌不忙 bùhuāngbùmáng calm; unhurried verb 1 hurry; hasten; make haste 忙什么, 再坐一会儿吧。 máng shénme, zài zuò yīhuìr ba. What’s the hurry? Stay a bit longer. 别忙于下结论。 Bié mángyú xià jiélùn. Don’t jump to conclusions. 2 work; do 忙完一天工作 Máng wán yī tiān gōngzuò finish a long day’s work 他在忙论文。 Tā zài máng lùnwén. He’s working on a paper. 我一个人忙不过来。 Wǒ yī ge rén máng bù guòlai. I can’t manage all this by myself.

catassign.category: New Practical Chinese Reader Complete Volume 1 and 2/Lesson 2

entry.defn: adjective two-sided; double-edged; double-faced; reversible
noun paper

adjective 1 unilateral 片面之词 piànmiànzhīcí one side’s story; one party’s version of an event, etc.; one person’s word against another’s 片面撕毁协议 piànmiàn sīhuǐ xiéyì unilaterally tear up an agreement 2 one-sided (opp. 全面) 片面观点 piànmiàn guāndiǎn lopsided (or one-sided) view 片面强调 piànmiàn qiángdiào put undue emphasis on 片面地看问题 piànmiàn de kàn wèntí take a one-sided approach to problems

noun postal matter; post; mail 电子邮件 diànzǐyóujiàn email 挂号邮件 guàhào yóujiàn registered post 航空邮件 hángkōng yóujiàn air mail 小包邮件 xiǎobāo yóujiàn postal packet 早班邮件几点到？ Zǎobān yóujiàn jǐ diǎn dào？ When does the morning post come in? 末班邮件几点走？ Mò bān yóujiàn jǐ diǎn zǒu？ When does the last post go out? 今天的邮件量特别大。 Jīntiān de yóujiàn liàng tèbié dà. There’s an unusually heavy post (or mail) today.
send an email
email
noun wheat flour; flour
noun cream
avocado (Persea americana)
noun spoon 放一调羹糖 Fàng yī tiáogēng táng add a spoon of sugar
noun teaspoon 两茶匙糖 Liǎng cháchí táng two teaspoons of sugar
noun spoon
noun tablespoon; soup spoon
sauce
noun 1 chemistry grease 黄油枪 huángyóu qiāng grease gun 2 butter

noun characteristic; distinguishing feature (or quality) 艺术特色 yìshù tèsè artistic characteristics 象牙雕刻的传统特色 xiàngyá diāokè de chuántǒng tèsè the traditional features of ivory carving 富有民族特色的歌舞节目 fùyǒu mínzú tèsè de gēwǔ jiémù songs and dances with distinctive national features 建设有中国特色的社会主义 jiànshè yǒu Zhōngguó tèsè de shèhuìzhǔyì build socialism with Chinese characteristics

verb 1 be brave enough; dare 敢想, 敢说, 敢干 gǎn xiǎng, gǎn shuō, gǎn gàn dare to think, speak, and act 过去连想都不敢想的事, 现在变成了现实。 Guòqu lián xiǎng dōu bù gǎn xiǎng de shì, xiànzài biànchéng le xiànshí. What was unimaginable in the past has now become reality. 2 have the confidence to; be certain; be sure 这我可不敢说。 zhè wǒ kěbugǎn shuō. I’m not sure about that. 3 literary self-deprecating make bold; venture 敢问 Gǎnwèn venture to ask; be so bold as to ask adjective bold; brave; courageous; daring 勇敢 yǒnggǎn brave
(not) any more

adjective 1 ripe (opp. 生) 一年两熟 yīniánliǎngshú two crops a year 西红柿熟了。 Xīhóngshì shú le. The tomatoes are ripe. 2 cooked; done (opp. 生) 熟肉 shúròu cooked meat 饭熟了。 Fàn shú le. The rice is done. 3 processed (opp. 生) 熟皮子 shú pízi tanned leather 4 familiar; well acquainted (opp. 生) 我跟他很熟。 wǒ gēn tā hěn shú. I’m on familiar terms with him. 这条路他最熟。 Zhè tiáo lù tā zuì shú. He knows this route best. 这个地方我很熟。 Zhège dìfang wǒ hěn shú. I’m familiar with this place. 这口音听起来很熟。 Zhè kǒuyin tīng qǐlai hěn shú. The voice sounds familiar. 5 skilled; experienced; practised (opp. 生) 熟精 shújīng be versed in sth. 6 (of a sleep) deep; sound 睡得很熟 Shuì de hěn shú sleep soundly
adjective dirty; filthy 脏水 zāngshuǐ filthy water; slops; sewage 脏衣服 Zāng yīfu dirty (or soiled) clothes; dirty linen 别把桌布弄脏了。 Bié bǎ zhuōbù nòng zāng le. Don’t soil the tablecloth.

verb 1 attack; assault; launch an offensive 发起总攻击 Fāqǐ zǒng gōngjī launch a general offensive 2 accuse; charge; vilify 恶毒攻击 èdú gōngjī viciously attack 人身攻击 rénshēn gōngjī personal attack 无端的攻击 wúduān de gōngjī groundless charges
noun honey bee; bee 蜜蜂饲养 mìfēng sìyǎng bee-keeping
noun honey
noun industry
verb headhunt noun headhunter
verb colloquial live; get along 会过日子 huì guòrìzi manage to live well 小两口儿和和气气地过日子。 Xiǎo liǎngkǒur héhéqìqì de guò rìzi. The young couple get along well together. or The young couple live in harmony.

verb compare; contrast 把译文和原文比较一下 Bǎ yìwén hé yuánwén bǐjiào yīxià check the translation against the original 做细致的比较 Zuò xìzhì debǐjiào make a detailed comparison 做粗略的比较 zuò cūlüè debǐjiào make a rough comparison 有比较才能鉴别。 Yǒu bǐjiào cái néng jiànbié. Comparison leads to differentiation. 和其他孩子比较, 他有点儿迟钝。 hé qítā háizibǐjiào, tā yǒudiǎnr chídùn. He is a bit slow compared to other children. adverb fairly; comparatively; relatively; quite; rather 比较好 bǐjiào hǎo fairly good 比较快 bǐjiào kuài relatively fast 比较累 bǐjiào lèi rather tired 比较而言 bǐjiào'éryán relatively speaking preposition (used to compare a difference in degree) 比较去年有显著的增长 Bǐjiào qùnián yǒu xiǎnzhù de zēngzhǎng show a marked increase over last year
Germany
France; French
noun audience; listeners

noun staff; personnel 员工的怨言 yuángōng de yuànyán staff woes 培训员工 péixùn yuángōng train employees 全体员工 quántǐ yuángōng all personnel 师生员工 shīshēngyuángōng teachers, students, administrative personnel and workers
noun bookshelf; a set of bookshelves; bookcase
1 stage 2 proscenium 3 foreground in politics etc (sometimes derog.) 4 front desk 5 reception desk 6 (computing) front-end 7 foreground
verb be affected by; catch 感受风寒 Gǎnshòu fēnghán affected by the cold; catch cold noun experience; feeling 感受很深 gǎnshòu hěn shēn have a deep impression; be deeply impressed
verb define; describe exactly 怎样定义这一概念？ Zěnyàng dìngyì zhè yī gàiniàn? How to define this concept?

noun 1 concept; conception; notion; idea 基本概念 Jīběn gàiniàn fundamental concept; basic concept 玩弄概念游戏 wánnòng gàiniàn yóuxì play with concepts (to confuse or show off) 有一点儿模糊的概念 yǒu yīdiǎnr móhu degàiniàn have a hazy idea about sth. 2 new design
adjective brave; courageous 勇敢善战 yǒnggǎnshànzhàn courageous and skillful in battle 勤劳勇敢的人民 qínláo yǒnggǎn de rénmín brave and industrious people

verb (-//-) sign one's name; autograph 签名盖章 qiānmíng gàizhāng sign and affix one’s seal; set one’s hand and seal to 亲笔签名的照片 qīnbǐ qiānmíng de zhàopiàn an autographed picture 她请电影明星在本子上签了个名。 Tā qǐng diànyǐng míngxīng zài běnzi shàng qiān le ge míng. She asked the movie star to sign his autograph in her notebook. noun signature; autograph 为请愿书集取到一万份签名 wèi qǐngyuànshū jí qǔ dào yīwàn fèn qiānmíng collected 10,000 signatures for the petition

verb 1 press; push down 按电钮 àn diànniǔ press (or push) a button 按门铃 àn ménlíng ring a doorbell 按图钉 àn túdīng press a thumbtack 2 leave aside; shelve 按下此事不提 Àn xià cǐ shì bù tí leave this aside for the moment 3 restrain; control 按不住心头怒火 àn bù zhù xīntóu nùhuǒ unable to restrain (or control, keep down) one’s anger 4 keep one's hand on; grasp; grip 按住操纵杆 ànzhù cāozònggǎn grasp the control lever preposition according to; in accordance with; in the light of; on the basis of 按比例 ànbǐlì in proportion to; a ratio of 按表收费 àn biǎo shōufèi charge by meter 按常规办事 àn chángguī bànshì according to convention; in accordance with practice 按年代顺序排列 àn niándài shùnxù páiliè arrange in chronological order 按票面价格 àn piàomiàn jiàgé at par 按人口平均 ànrénkǒu píngjūn per capita; per head 按质定价 ànzhìdìngjià price fixed according to quality noun comment or note (by an editor or author) 编(者)按 biān àn editor’s note verb literary check; refer to 有原文可按。 Yǒu yuánwén kě àn. There’s the original to refer to.
1 to press down 2 to press a button
noun key; button 暂停按钮 zàntíng ànniǔ the pause button

verb explode; blow up; detonate 爆炸一个核装置 Bàozhà yī ge hézhuāngzhì detonate a nuclear device 人口爆炸 rénkǒu bàozhà population explosion 军火库爆炸了。 Jūnhuǒkù bàozhà le. The ammunition dump blew up. 炸弹爆炸了。 Zhàdàn bàozhà le. A bomb exploded.

noun 1 newspaper 地方报纸 dìfang bàozhǐ local (or provincial) paper 订阅报纸 dìngyuè bàozhǐ subscribe to a newspaper 国内报纸 guónèi bàozhǐ home paper; domestic newspaper 浏览报纸 liúlǎn bàozhǐ scan a newspaper 通俗报纸 tōngsú bàozhǐ popular paper 投递报纸 tóudì bàozhǐ deliver newspapers 严肃报纸 yánsù bàozhǐ quality paper 2 newsprint
adjective young 年轻力壮 niánqīnglìzhuàng young and vigorous 他比我年轻。 tā bǐ wǒ niánqīng. He’s younger than I am. 干部要年轻化。 Gànbù yào niánqīnghuà. Lower the average age of our government officials.
noun youth; young people 好青年 hǎo qīngnián a worthy young person 新青年 xīn qīngnián young people of the new generation
talent M: 份fèn [份]
1 to change into 2 to turn into 3 to become
1 rich 2 full of
1 friendly 2 amicable 3 close friend
playground
1 old 2 opposite: new 新 3 former 4 worn (with age)

verb plan; intend 他打算当教师。 Tā dǎsuan dāng jiàoshī. He intends to become a teacher. 代表团打算去西安访问。 Dàibiǎotuán dǎsuan qù Xī'ān fǎngwèn. The delegation plans to visit Xi’an. noun consideration; calculation 各有各的打算。 Gè yǒu gè de dǎsuan. Each has a plan of his own. or Each has his own calculations. 为自己作打算 wèi zìjǐ zuò dǎsuan further one’s own interests 作最坏的打算 Zuò zuì huài de dǎsuan be prepared for the worst
to bring back
1 cowhide 2 leather 3 fig. flexible and tough 4 boasting 5 big talk

adjective 1 coarse; rough (opp. 细腻) 皮肤粗糙 pífū cūcāo rough skin 2 crude; rough 粗糙的翻译 cūcāo de fānyì rough translation 粗糙的计划 cūcāo de jìhuà slipshod plan 手工粗糙 shǒugōng cūcāo crudely made; of poor workmanship
noun [in exclamations] God; Heavens 我的老天爷！ Wǒ de lǎotiānyé! My goodness! or Good Heavens! or Good Gracious!
noun computing mouse 点击鼠标右键 Diǎnjī shǔbiāo yòu jiàn click the right key of a mouse
1 to welcome 2 welcome
noun transliteration sushi
noun gift; present 生日礼物 shēng ri lǐ wù birthday present 圣诞礼物 Shèngdàn lǐwù Christmas gift
bodybuilding apparatus
noun pet 宠物狗 chǒngwùgǒu pet dog 宠物猫 chǒngwù māo pet cat 养宠物 yǎng chǒngwù keep a pet 电子宠物 diànzǐ chǒngwù electronic pet 他把蛇当宠物养。 tā bǎ shé dāng chǒngwù yǎng. He keeps snakes as pets.
noun point of view; viewpoint; standpoint 阐明观点 chǎnmíng guāndiǎn explain one’s position; lay out one’s point of view; state one’s position
noun order for goods; order form

verb print 彩色印刷 cǎisè yìnshuā coloured printing 立体印刷 lìtǐ yìnshuā stereoscopic (or three-dimensional) printing 第一次印刷 Dì-yī cì yìnshuā first impression (or printing) 三色版印刷 sānsèbǎn yìnshuā three-colour halftone 这本书正在印刷中。 Zhè běn shū zhèng zài yìnshuā zhōng. The book is in the press.

noun at the same time; simultaneously; meanwhile; in the meantime 同时存在 tóngshí cúnzài exist simultaneously; exist side by side; coexist 同时发生 tóngshí fāshēng happen at the same time; coincide; concur 在加快工程进度的同时, 必须注意质量。 Zài jiākuài gōngchéng jìndù detóngshí, bìxū zhùyì zhìliàng. While speeding up work on the project, we must pay attention to ensuring its quality. conjunction moreover; besides; furthermore 任务艰巨, 同时时间又很紧迫。 Rènwu jiānjù, tóngshí shíjiān yòu hěn jǐnpò. The task is arduous and besides, there’s little time. 造林可以保持水土, 同时也可以制止流沙。 Zàolín kěyǐ bǎochí shuǐtǔ, tóngshí yě kěyǐ zhìzhǐ liúshā. Afforestation conserves soil and water and also checks drift sand.

noun 1 taste; flavour 这个菜味道很好。 Zhège cài wèidao hěn hǎo. This dish is delicious. 感冒时吃东西没味道。 gǎnmào shí chī dōngxi méi wèidao. When you have a cold, you can’t taste anything. 2 feeling; taste; experience 心里有一股说不出的味道 Xīnli yǒu yī gǔ shuō bù chū de wèidao have an indescribable feeling 他的话里有点儿讽刺的味道。 Tā dehuà lǐ yǒudiǎnr fěngcì dewèidao. There’s a touch of irony in his remarks. 3 interest; delight 这本书越看越有味道。 Zhè běn shū yuè kàn yuè yǒu wèidao. The more you read of the book, the more it absorbs you. 4 dialect smell; odour 这味道真难闻。 Zhè wèidao zhēn nánwén. What an unpleasant smell! or This smells bad! 她身上散发着一种特别的味道。 Tā shēnshang sànfā zhe yī zhǒng tèbié dewèidao. She gives off a special smell.

verb worth; merit; deserve 值得买 Zhíde mǎi worth buying 值得怀疑 zhíde huáiyí open to doubt 值得赞许 zhíde zànxǔ deserve commendation; praiseworthy 值得仔细考虑 zhíde zǐxì kǎolǜ warrant careful consideration 不值得一提 Bù zhíde yī tí not worth mentioning; unimportant 李贺的诗很值得一读 Lǐ hè de shī hěn zhíde yī dú. Li He’s poems are well worth reading. 历史的经验值得注意。 Lìshǐ de jīngyàn zhíde zhùyì. The lessons of history merit attention. 这个展览会很值得一看。 Zhège zhǎnlǎn huì hěn zhíde yī kàn. The exhibition is well worth a visit. 这辆旧车不值得修了。 Zhè liàng jiù chē bù zhíde xiū le. This old car isn’t worth repairing.
It was worth a try

catassign.category: IDIOMS, Phrases

entry.defn: noun frisbee disk; frisbee 玩飞盘 Wán fēipán play frisbees 掷飞盘 zhì fēipán flip (or toss) a frisbee

noun money; currency 储备货币 chǔbèi huòbì reserve currency 广义货币 guǎngyì huòbì broad money; M2 狭义货币 Xiáyì huòbì narrow money; M1 周转货币 zhōuzhuǎn huòbì vehicle currency 自由兑换货币 zìyóu duìhuàn huòbì convertible currency
currency exchange
1 to protect 2 to defend 3 to safeguard 4 protection M: 种zhǒng [种]
1 especially 2 special 3 particular 4 unusual

adverb at (long) last; in the end; finally 她终于到了, 晚了将近半小时。 Tā zhōngyú dào le, wǎn le jiāngjìn bàn xiǎoshí. She finally arrived about half an hour late. 他们终于登上了珠峰。 tāmenzhōngyú dēngshàng le Zhūfēng. They finally succeeded in scaling Mount Everest.
onomatopoeia drone; buzz; hum 蜜蜂嗡嗡地飞。 Mìfēng wēngwēng de fēi. Bees are buzzing all around.
noun putonghua; mandarin; common speech (of the Chinese language); standard Chinese (pronunciation)
Guangdong dialect; Cantonese (a variant of 粤语)
noun original complex form of a simplified Chinese character (opp. 简体字)
noun simplified Chinese character (opp. 繁体字)

noun 1 marketplace; market; bazaar 市场疲软 shìchǎng píruǎn sluggish market; slow market 市场竞争日益加剧 shìchǎng jìngzhēng rìyì jiājù increasing market competition 国内外市场 guónèiwài shìchǎng domestic and foreign markets 买方市场 mǎifāng shìchǎng buyer’s market 卖方市场 màifāng shìchǎng seller’s market 市场繁荣。 Shìchǎng fánróng. The market is brisk. 市场混乱。 Shìchǎng hùnluàn. The market is in a chaotic state. 市场供应充足。 Shìchǎng gōngyìng chōngzú. There is an ample supply of commodities. or Markets are well-stocked. 2 figurative sphere of influence 这种理论在群众中的市场越来越小。 zhèzhǒng lǐlùn zài qúnzhòng zhòngdì shìchǎng yuèláiyuè xiǎo. This theory is losing popular support.

noun details; particulars 讨论计划的细节 tǎolùn jìhuà de xìjié discuss the details of a plan; go into the particulars of a plan 通过细节描写来表现人物性格 tōngguò xìjié miáoxiě lái biǎoxiàn rénwù xìnggé portray a character through descriptive detail
synonym (opp. 反义词)
noun linguistics antonym (opp. 同义词, 近义词)

adjective 1 thin; slender (opp. 粗) 细铁丝 xì tiěsī thin wire 她们纺的线又细又匀。 Tāmen fǎng de xiàn yòu xì yòu yún. The thread they spin is fine and even. 2 in small particles; fine 细沙 xìshā fine sand 玉米面磨得很细。 Yùmǐmiàn mó de hěn xì. The corn flour is ground very fine. 3 thin and soft 细嗓子 Xìsǎng zi a reedy voice; a thin voice 4 fine; exquisite; delicate 这几件玉雕做得真细！ Zhè jǐ jiàn yùdiāo zuò de zhēn xì! What exquisite (or delicate) jade carvings! 5 careful; meticulous; detailed 细看 xìkàn examine carefully; scrutinize 细问 xìwèn make detailed inquiries; ask about details; question closely 工作做得细 gōngzuò zuò de xì meticulous work 6 minute; trifling 分工很细 fēngōng hěn xì an elaborate division of labour; divide the work carefully 事无巨细 shìwújùxì all matters, big and small 7 dialect young; little 细妹子 xì mèizi little girl

adjective 1 rare; scarce; uncommon 物以稀为贵。 wù yǐ xī wéi guì. Rarity increases value. 2 sparse; scattered (opp. 密) 月明星稀。 Yuèmíngxīngxī. The moon is bright and the stars wide apart. 他的头发很稀。 Tā de tóufa hěn xī. He has very thin hair. 这块地的麦苗太稀。 Zhè kuài dì de màimiáo tài xī. The wheat seedlings in this field are too sparse. 3 watery; thin (opp. 稠) 粥太稀了。 Zhōu tài xī le. This gruel is too thin. 我想喝点儿稀的。 Wǒ xiǎng hē diǎnr xī de. I’d like to have something with soup. or I don’t fancy anything solid. adverb [modifying certain adjectives] very; extremely 稀烂 xīlàn completely mashed; like paste noun sth. liquid or of thin consistency 糖稀 tángxī syrup; molasses

verb 1 be vexed; be irritated; be annoyed 你烦什么？ Nǐ fán shénme？ What are you getting so annoyed about? 2 be tired of 这话我都听烦了。 Zhè huà wǒ dōu tīng fán le. I'm fed up with this kind of talk. 3 courteous trouble (sb. to do sth.); bother 烦交某人 Fán jiāo mǒurén please forward this to so-and-so 烦您给她捎个信儿。 Fán nín gěi tā shāo ge xìnr. May I trouble you to pass on a message to her? 烦请贵公司尽速将货样寄来。 Fán qǐng guì gōngsī jìn sù jiāng huòyàng jì lái. Please mail us a sample of the merchandise as soon as possible. adjective 1 superfluous 要言不烦 yàoyánbùfán terse; succinct; pithy 2 redundant and confusing See 68844330烦杂fan2za2烦杂
noun page number
N. number of pages
noun book page; printed page

noun 1 body 保持身体平衡 bǎochí shēntǐ pínghéng keep one’s balance 2 health 身体顶得住 shēntǐ dǐngdézhù have physical constitution up to the demands of the job or situation 身体非常健康 shēntǐ fēicháng jiànkāng be in excellent health 注意身体 zhùyì shēntǐ look after one’s health 她最近身体怎么样？ Tā zuìjìn shēntǐ zěnmeyàng？ How is she these days?
noun 1 unmarried; single 2 not be with one's family; live alone 单身在外 dānshēnzàiwài live alone away from home
adverb at all places; everywhere 到处碰壁 dàochù pèngbì run into snags everywhere 烟头不要到处乱扔。 Yāntóu bùyào dàochù luàn rēng. Don’t drop cigarette ends about.
verb 1 weave 织席 zhīxí weave (or make) a mat 2 knit 织毛衣 zhī máoyī knit a sweater
A group of people
noun printing machine; (printing) press 滚筒印刷机 gǔntǒng yìnshuājī cylinder press 轮转印刷机 lúnzhuǎn yìnshuājī rotary press 双面印刷机 shuāngmiàn yìnshuājī perfecting press; perfector
noun India

noun assignment; mission; task; job 承担任务 chéngdān rènwu assume a mission 接受任务 Jiēshòu rènwu accept an assignment 完成任务 wánchéng rènwu fulfill the task; complete the mission 主要任务 zhǔyào rènwu main task 担负艰巨的任务 Dānfù jiānjù de rènwu shoulder a difficult task 压倒一切的任务 yādǎo yīqiè de rènwu overwhelming task

verb pass by (or through) (a place) 从天津到上海, 路过济南 Cóng Tiānjīn dào Shànghǎi, lùguò Jǐnán pass through Jinan en route from Tianjin to Shanghai 这趟车不路过北京。 zhè tàng chē bù lùguò Běijīng. This train will not pass through Beijing. 正好路过这里, 就来看看你。 Zhènghǎo lùguò zhèlǐ, jiù lái kànkan nǐ. I was passing by and dropped in to say hello.
1 to look forward to 2 to await 3 expectation
Online group chat

verb 1 catch (or seize) hold of; grip 抓住机遇 zhuāzhù jīyù grasp the opportunity 抓住要害 zhuāzhù yàohài get to the root of; find the main cause; scratch where it itches 抓住她的胳膊 Zhuāzhù tā de gēbo take (or grab) her arm 抓住一点儿小事做文章 zhuāzhù yīdiǎnr xiǎoshì zuò wénzhāng seize on a trifle and make an issue of it; make a fuss about nothing 2 catch; capture 抓住一个小偷 zhuāzhù yī ge xiǎotōu catch a thief 3 grip the attention; gripping 这出戏一开场就抓住了观众。 Zhè chū xì yī kāichǎng jiù zhuāzhù le guānzhòng. The play gripped the audience from the moment the curtain rose.
seize a chance
1 to surpass 2 to exceed 3 to outstrip
Number of steps

verb 1 walk; go on foot 孩子已经学会走路了。 Háizi yǐjing xuéhuì zǒulù le. The baby has learned to walk. 你们是坐车去还是走路去？ Nǐmen shì zuò chē qù hái shì zǒulù qù？ Will you go by bus or on foot? 打运动战, 走路的时间常多于作战的时间。 dǎ yùndòngzhàn, zǒulù de shíjiān cháng duōyú zuòzhàn de shíjiān. In mobile warfare, more time is often spent on the move than fighting. 2 leave; go away
1 at all times 2 at every moment

tornado
noun New Year cake (made of glutinous rice flour)
noun 1 New York City 2 New York State
verb receive; draw; get 领取工资 Lǐngqǔ gōngzī draw (or collect) one’s salary (or pay, wage) 领取出入证 lǐngqǔ chūrùzhèng receive one’s pass
noun cereal
oatmeal porridge; oatmeal
1 to care about 2 to take offense 3 to mind

stir-fried pork, favorite of Northern Song writer Su Shi 苏轼, a.k.a. Su Dongpo 苏东坡

noun 1 on the road 路上停着一辆车。 Lùshang tíng zhe yī liàng chē. There is a car parked on the road. 2 on the way; en route 路上要用的东西 lùshang yào yòng de dōngxi things needed for the journey 回来的路上 huílai delùshang on one’s way back (一)路上小心。 lùshang xiǎoxīn. Take care on the way. 路上不要耽搁。 Lù shang bù yào dānge. Don’t waste any time on the way. 我正在路上。 Wǒ zhèngzài lùshang. I’m on my way.
verb pray; say one's prayers

noun 1 flight of steps; steps leading up to a house, etc.; stairway 2 chance to extricate oneself from an awkward position; a way out; out 给他个台阶下吧。 Gěi tā ge táijiē xià ba. Give him an out. 3 mining bench 上台阶 Shàng táijiē upper bench 4 figurative new phase; new level [often together with “再上”] 争取明年的工作再上一个新台阶 Zhēngqǔ míngnián de gōngzuò zài shàng yī ge xīn táijiē aim for a new level in next year’s work See 32835840下台阶xia4tai2jie1下台阶
noun church 大教堂 dàjiàotáng cathedral 小教堂 xiǎojiàotáng chapel

noun 1 god; deity; divinity; immortal 神鬼 shén-guǐ gods and ghosts 诸神 Zhū shén gods 命运之神 mìngyùn zhī shén the god of fortune 2 spirit; mind 耗神 hào shén take up one’s energy 双目有神 shuāngmù yǒushén have a pair of piercing eyes 3 expression; look 眼神 yǎnshén expression in one’s eyes adjective 1 supernatural; magical; miraculous 神投手 shén tóushǒu sharpshooter (in basketball); superb shooter (or scorer) 2 dialect smart; clever 这孩子真神！ Zhè háizi zhēn shén! What a smart child! 这家伙神了！ Zhè jiāhuo shén le! This fellow is incredible!

adjective warm 天气温暖 tiānqìwēnnuǎn warm weather 对同志像春天般温暖 duì tóngzhì xiàng chūntiān bān wēnnuǎn be as kind as spring to one’s comrades verb make warm 他的一席话温暖了我的心。 tā de yīxí huà wēnnuǎn le wǒ de xīn. What he said warmed my heart.
noun tender feelings 充满温情 chōngmǎn wēnqíng full of tender feelings adjective soft-hearted; compassionate 你对他太温情了。 Nǐ duì tā tài wēnqíng le. You’re too lenient with him.

verb be enthusiastic in 热心科学 rèxīn kēxué eager to promote science adjective enthusiastic; ardent; earnest; warm-hearted 热心传授技术 rèxīn chuánshòu jìshù make earnest efforts to pass on one’s skill 热心为顾客服务 Rèxīn wèi gùkè fúwù warm-heartedly serve the customers
1 oh alas 2 hey! 3 hi! (loanword) 4 a high (natural or drug-induced) (loanword)

1 correct 2 proper
noun Pacific (Ocean)
noun 1 terrace 2 house with a flat plastered roof 3 movable platform 4 computing platform 视窗平台 shìchuāng píngtái Windows platform 5 platform; place 交流的平台 jiāoliú depíngtái platform for communication
noun sweat (esp. in large amounts) 汗水湿透了他的衣衫。 Hànshuǐ shī tòu le tā de yīshān. His shirt was soaked through with sweat.

verb 1 courteous excuse me; please 请问, 到火车站怎么走？ Qǐngwèn, dào huǒchēzhàn zěnme zǒu？ Excuse me, but could you tell me how to get to the station? 2 we should like to ask; it may be asked; one may ask 请问, 要不是改革开放, 我们的经济建设能有今天吗？ Qǐngwèn, yào bù shì gǎigé kāifàng, wǒmen de jīngjì jiànshè néng yǒu jīntiān ma？ I’d like to ask, without reform and the open policy, could our economic development be what it is today?

catassign.category: New Practical Chinese Reader Complete Volume 1 and 2/Lesson 4

entry.defn: noun 1 drinks; beverages and alcohol 2 dialect feast; banquet
noun stable

adjective stable; steady 情绪稳定 Qíngxù wěndìng be in a calm, unruffled mood; steady mood 保持稳定和繁荣 Bǎochí wěndìng hé fánróng maintain stability and prosperity 不稳定的国际金融市场 bù wěndìng de guójì jīnróng shìchǎng fluctuating international financial market verb stabilize; steady 稳定情绪 Wěndìng qíngxù calm down; set sb.’s mind at rest; reassure sb. 稳定物价 wěndìng wùjià stabilize commodity prices
verb regret; repent 后悔不已 hòuhuǐbùyǐ be overcome with regret 我很后悔当初没有听他的话。 Wǒ hěn hòuhuǐ dāngchū méiyǒu tīng tā de huà. I regret that I didn’t heed his advice.

adjective 1 positive 积极财政政策 jījí cáizhèng zhèngcè proactive fiscal policy 做出积极贡献 zuòchū jījí gòngxiàn make positive contributions 2 active; energetic; vigorous 积极思考 jījí sīkǎo active thinking 积极向上 jījí xiàngshàng set high goals for oneself 积极进取的精神 jījí jìnqǔ de jīngshén pioneering spirit 采取积极措施 Cǎiqǔ jījí cuòshī adopt vigorous measures 他工作积极, 受到奖励。 tā gōngzuò jījí, shòudào jiǎnglì. He was given an award for being a hard worker. 他锻炼身体一向很积极。 Tā duànliàn shēntǐ yīxiàng hěn jījí. He has always been very keen on doing physical exercises.
R.F. hurriedly; hastily; in a rush
R.F. very busy
verb (-//-) get rid of; kill 除掉卖国贼 chúdiào màiguózéi remove a traitor preposition except 除掉星期日我每天都工作。 chúdiào Xīngqīrì wǒ měitiān dōu gōngzuò. I work every day except Sunday.
1 to add oil 2 to top up with gas 3 to refuel 4 to accelerate 5 to step on the gas 6 (fig.) to make an extra effort 7 to cheer sb on

noun 1 grand celebration 十年大庆 shí nián dàqìng the festive occasion of the 10th anniversary 2 birthday of an old person who commands respect 七十(岁)大庆 Qīshí dàqìng 70th birthday 3 (Dàqìng) Daqing (an oil-producing city in Heilongjiang Province) 大庆油田 Dà qìng Yóu tián Daqing Oilfield
1 to attempt 2 to try
verb feel grateful; be thankful; feel indebted 不胜感激 bùshènggǎnjī be deeply grateful; feel very much indebted 很感激你给我的帮助。 Hěn gǎnjī nǐ gěi wǒ de bāngzhù. I’m very grateful for your help.
noun brown sugar See 17041152白糖bai2tang2白糖
noun (refined) white sugar See 22675712红糖hong2tang2红糖

adjective ache; have a pain; be sore 腿疼 tuǐ téng have a pain in the leg 胃疼 wèi téng have a stomachache 嗓子疼 sǎngzi téng have a sore throat 浑身都疼 húnshēn dōu téng ache all over 你那个牙还疼吗？ Nǐ nàge yá hái téng ma？ Does your tooth still ache? verb love dearly; be fond of; dote on; care about 奶奶最疼小孙子。 Nǎinai zuì téng xiǎo sūnzi. Granny dotes on her little grandson. 这孩子怪招人疼的。 Zhè háizi guài zhāo rén téng de. This child is really adorable.
noun technical terms; terminology 术语标准化 shùyǔ biāozhǔnhuà standardization of terminology 军事术语 Jūnshì shùyǔ military terms 医学术语 yīxué shùyǔ medical terminology
1 to move 2 to exercise 3 sports 4 exercise 5 motion 6 movement 7 campaign M: 场chǎng [场]

noun interest; taste 兴趣盎然 xìngqù àngrán with well sustained interest; with unflagging interest 对文学产生了兴趣 duì wénxué chǎnshēng le xìngqù become interested in literature 我对下棋不感兴趣。 Wǒ duì xiàqí bù gǎn xìngqù. I’m not interested in chess.
noun choice 没有选择 méi·yǒu xuǎnzé have no choice at all verb select; choose; opt 选择职业 xuǎnzé zhíyè choose an occupation 选择(的)余地 xuǎnzé yúdì option; choice

verb 1 design; plan 设计版面 shèjì bǎnmiàn lay out a printed page 设计一座厂房 Shèjì yī zuò chǎngfáng make designs for a factory building 设计一座水坝 shèjì yī zuò shuǐbà project a dam 设计一种新机器 shèjì yī zhǒng xīn jīqì design a new machine 2 work out a plan (or scheme) 设计陷害 shèjì xiànhài plot a frame-up; frame

noun 1 fellow student; schoolmate 2 [addressing a student] verb (-//-) attend the same school; be a schoolmate of 我和他同过三年学。 Wǒ hé tā tóng guò sān nián xué. He and I studied in the same school for three years. or We were schoolmates for three years.

adverb colloquial not very; not particularly 我不怎么想去。 Wǒ bù zěnme xiǎng qù. I’m not particularly keen on going. 他不怎么爱说话。 Tā bù zěnme ài shuōhuà. He doesn’t talk much. 这块地不怎么大。 Zhè kuài dì bù zěnme dà. This plot of land isn’t very big.

noun middle school 初级中学 chūjízhōngxué junior middle school 高级中学 gāojízhōngxué senior middle school 中学生 zhōngxuéshēng middle school student noun dated Chinese learning (a late Qing Dynasty term for Chinese traditional learning) (opp. 西学) 中学为体, 西学为用 Zhōngxué wéi tǐ, xīxué wéi yòng Chinese learning as the fundamental structure, Western learning for practical use
noun 1 primary (or elementary) school 2 dated philological studies

verb 1 understand; comprehend 了解真相 liǎojiě zhēnxiàng understand the facts 彼此了解 bǐcǐ liǎojiě know each other full well 对……有透彻的了解 Duì……yǒu tòuchè deliǎojiě have a thorough grasp of; be well versed in 2 find out; acquaint oneself with 了解国内外科技发展状况 liǎojiě guónèiwài kējì fāzhǎn zhuàngkuàng keep abreast of current developments in science and technology at home and abroad 设法了解全部情况 shèfǎ liǎojiě quánbù qíngkuàng try to find out about the whole situation noun understanding; comprehension 增进两国人民之间的了解 Zēngjìn liǎng guó rénmín zhījiān de liǎojiě promote (or enhance) understanding between the two peoples 我对市场经济缺乏了解。 wǒ duì shìchǎng jīngjì quēfá liǎojiě. My understanding of market economy is limited.
noun tone; pitch 音调铿锵 Yīndiào kēngqiāng ringing tone 这首歌音调高了点儿。 zhè shǒu gē yīndiào gāo le diǎnr. The song is a bit high-pitched.
noun 1 turntable (as of a gramophone); roundabout (at crossroads) 2 sports giant stride 3 acrobatics disc-spinning 4 petrochemical rotary table 转盘速度 zhuànpán sùdù rotary speed
noun lunch-box; mess tin; dinner pail
1 government 2 official (approved or issued by an authority)
verb win victory; score a success 以多取胜 yǐ duō qǔshèng win victory through numerical superiority

verb be born 出生于富贵之家 chūshēng yú fùguì zhī jiā be born with a silver spoon in one’s month 他出生在美国。 Tā chūshēng zài Měiguó. He was born in the United States. 我是一九三〇年出生的。 wǒ shì yī jiǔ sān líng nián chūshēng de. I was born in 1930.

adjective 1 easy 好(不)容易 hǎobùróngyì not at all easy; in a hard way 容易的题先做。 Róngyì de tí xiān zuò. Do the easy problems first. 说起来容易做起来难。 Shuō qǐlai róngyì zuò qǐlai nán. It’s easier said than done. 2 likely; liable; apt 他容易生病。 Tā róngyì shēngbìng. He often gets ill. 这容易引起误会。 Zhè róngyì yǐnqǐ wùhuì. This is liable to cause misunderstanding. 人们容易把这两个问题混淆起来。 Rénmen róngyì bǎ zhè liǎng ge wèntí hùnxiáo qǐlai. People are apt to confuse the two issues.
The more scared I am

noun all night; the whole night; throughout the night 通宵商店 tōngxiāo shāngdiàn round-the-clock shop 通宵值班 tōngxiāo zhíbān on duty all night; the nightshift 干了个通宵 gàn le ge tōngxiāo work all night; work through the night
1 to roam around 2 to have a stroll
verb grow up; be brought up 长不大 zhǎng bù dà unable to grow up; very naive 我长大了当医生。 Wǒ zhǎngdà le dāng yīshēng. I’m going to be a doctor when I grow up.
adjective rare and precious; exotic
verb massage 给某人按摩 Gěi mǒurén ànmó give sb. a massage
1 lit. the color blue is made out of indigo but is more vivid than indigo (idiom) 2 fig. the student surpasses the master

entry.defn: to rent an apartment
noun rent (for a house, flat, etc.); rental

noun 1 at (or by) one's side 老人把全家人叫到身边。 Lǎorén bǎ quánjiā rén jiào dào shēnbiān. The old man summoned the whole family to his side. 他在专家身边工作, 进步很快。 Tā zài zhuānjiā shēnbiān gōngzuò, jìnbù hěn kuài. Working at the side of the experts, he has made rapid progress. 2 (have sth.) on one; with one 身边没带钱 Shēnbiān méi dài qián have no money on one 她身边总是带着笔记本电脑。 tā shēnbiān zǒngshì dài zhe bǐjìběn diànnǎo. She never goes anywhere without her laptop computer.
preposition close to; near 傍近晌午 bàng jìn shǎngwu about noon 傍近身边 Bàng jìn shēnbiān by one’s side
deep-fried fish

verb look; seem; appear 他显得有点儿紧张。 Tā xiǎnde yǒudiǎnr jǐnzhāng. He seems a bit nervous. 屋子这么一布置, 显得宽敞多了。 Wūzi zhème yī bùzhì, xiǎnde kuānchang duō le. Arranged this way, the room looks much more spacious.

noun 1 idea; plan 好主意！ Hǎo zhǔyi! That’s a good idea. 人多主意多。 Rén duō zhǔyi duō. The more the people the more the ideas. 领导者的责任主要是出主意, 用干部两件事。 lǐngdǎozhě de zérèn zhǔyào shì chū zhǔyi, yòng gànbù liǎng jiàn shì. A leader has two main responsibilities: proposing ideas and using the right cadres. 2 decision; definite view 打定主意 Dǎdìng zhǔyi make a decision; make up one’s mind 改变主意 gǎibiàn zhǔyi change one’s view (or mind) 拿不定主意 nábudìng zhǔyi be in two minds (about sth.); uncertain 我一时没了主意。 Wǒ yīshí méi le zhǔyi. For a moment, I was at a loss.

noun 1 news 新闻图片橱窗 xīnwén túpiàn chúchuāng newsphoto display case 假新闻 jiǎxīnwén false news 软新闻 ruǎnxīnwén soft news 硬新闻 yìngxīnwén hard news 电视新闻 diànshì xīnwén TV news 国际新闻 guójì xīnwén international news 国外新闻 guówài xīnwén foreign news 国内新闻 guónèi xīnwén domestic news 简明新闻 jiǎnmíng xīnwén news in brief 金融新闻 jīnróng xīnwén financial news 体育新闻 tǐ yù xīn wén sports news 头版新闻 tóubǎn xīnwén front-page news (or story) 头条新闻 tóutiáoxīnwén headline 成为热门新闻 Chéngwéi rèmén xīnwén become the hottest news 2 news; information
adverb altogether; in all; all told 一共多少人？ Yīgòng duōshao rén？ How many are there altogether? 一共二十个。 Yīgòng èrshí ge. There are twenty in all (or all told).
1 multistoried building 2 tower 3 pagoda
local
Leftovers
late
bargain

verb include; consist of; comprise; incorporate 报价中不包括运费。 bàojià zhōng bù bāokuò yùnfèi. Carriage is not included in the quotation. 房租每月四百元, 水电费包括在内。 Fángzū měi yuè sìbǎi yuán, shuǐ-diànfèi bāokuò zàinèi. The rent is 400 yuan a month, including water and electricity. 他的报告包括三个方面。 Tā de bàogào bāokuò sān ge fāngmiàn. His report touched on three aspects. 我们的设计已经包括了你们的意见。 Wǒmen de shèjì yǐjing bāokuò le nǐmen de yìjian. Our design has incorporated your suggestions.

noun philosophy five elements (metal, wood, water, fire, and earth; believed by the ancients to make up the physical universe, later used in traditional Chinese medicine to explain various physiological and pathological phenomena) 五行相生。 wǔxíng xiāngshēng. The five elements originate from each other.
time flies (idiom)
