entry.defn: 1 once 2 once upon a time
N. 1 original price 2 cost price 3 wholesale price 4 production cost 5 prime cost
verb give a discount 打五折出售 dǎ wǔ zhé chūshòu sell at a 50% discount
noun 1 secretary 2 the post of secretary 担任秘书职务 dānrèn mìshū zhíwù hold the post of secretary
meeting (or conference) room; council chamber
shower jell; bath lotion
shampoo (liquid)
coconut milk
noun slippers
noun pillow

noun 1 specific field of study; specialization; speciality; discipline 该大学有十二个系, 四十一个专业。 Gāi dàxué yǒu shí'èr ge xì, sìshíyī ge zhuānyè. The university has 12 departments with 41 specialities. 2 specialized trade (or profession); special line; professional 专业生产会议 Zhuānyè shēngchǎn huìyì a conference on specialized trades 提供专业服务 tígōng zhuānyè fúwù offer professional service
verb 1 mend; patch up; repair; revamp 修补篱笆 xiūbǔ líba mend a fence 修补衣服 xiūbǔ yīfu patch clothes 修补渔网 xiūbǔ yúwǎng mend fishing nets 2 medicine repair 修补处女膜 xiūbǔ chǔnǚmó maidenhead recovery
1 to sample 2 to taste 3 to appreciate 4 one's taste (i.e. in music, literature, fashion, food and drink etc) 5 good taste
adjective passive (opp. 主动) 变被动为主动 biàn bèidòng wéi zhǔdòng regain the initiative 陷于被动地位 xiànyú bèidòng dìwèi lose the initiative; reduce to inaction; lose control
adjective super 超级间谍 Chāojí jiàndié superspy 超级明星 chāojí míngxīng superstar 超级模特 chāojí mótè super model
1 to reply 2 to recover 3 to return (to a previous condition) 4 Re: in reply to (email)
F.E. have no choice but

entry.defn: let off fireworks
noun 1 literary lovely spring scene 2 dated prostitution 烟花女 yānhuānǚ prostitute 烟花巷 yānhuāxiàng red-light district 3 fireworks 烟花爆竹 yān huā bào zhú fireworks
noun roof; housetop 四坡屋顶 Sì pō wūdǐng hip roof
adjective peaceful; tranquil; quiet; calm 宁静的夜晚 níngjìng de yèwǎn a tranquil night 心里渐渐宁静下来 xīnli jiànjiàn níngjìng xiàlai (emotions) calm down gradually
verb call on; visit; see; drop in; pay a visit 老人很孤单, 很少有人来看望。 Lǎorén hěn gūdān, hěn shǎoyǒu rén lái kànwang. The old man is lonely, and never has few visitors.
whistle
noun the greater part 一天大部分时间我都在工作。 yī tiān dàbùfen shíjiān wǒ dōu zài gōngzuò. I work most time of the day.
noun actor or actress; performer 配音演员 pèiyīn yǎnyuán dubbing actor (or actress) 挑选演员 tiāoxuǎn yǎnyuán choose the cast

noun 1 plot 情节紧凑 qíngjié jǐncòu a tight-knit (or well-knit) plot 这个剧本情节很复杂。 Zhège jùběn qíngjié hěn fùzá. The play has a very complicated plot. 2 circumstances 根据情节轻重, 分别给予处理。 Gēnjù qíngjié qīngzhòng, fēnbié jǐyǔ chǔlǐ. Each will be dealt with according to the seriousness of his case.
1 mood 2 state of mind 3 moodiness M: 种zhǒng [种]
noun natural gift; talent; endowments 他在数学方面很有天赋。 Tā zài shùxué fāngmiàn hěn yǒu tiānfù. He is very gifted at maths. adjective inborn; innate; endowed by nature
noun spectator; viewer; audience 电视观众 diànshì guānzhòng TV viewer
1 a glance 2 a quick look 3 a glimpse

verb catch sight of; see; get a view of 他们航行了二十天才看见陆地。 Tāmen hángxíng le èrshí tiān cái kànjian lùdì. They sighted land after being at sea for twenty days. 我们站在人们可以完全看见的地方。 Wǒmen zhàn zài rénmen kěyǐ wánquán kànjian de dìfang. We stood in full view of the crowd.
noun lipstick 涂口红 tū kǒuhóng lipstick one’s mouth; touch up one’s lipstick 涂着口红 tū zhe kǒuhóng wear lipstick
verb pay a bill 我付过账了。 wǒ fù guò zhàng le. I’ve already paid the bill.
computer science

noun 1 archaic Venus 2 famous performer; star 电影明星 diànyǐng míngxīng film (or movie) star 足球明星 zúqiú Míngxīng football star 全明星队 quán Míngxīng duì all-star team 3 dated society lady (or butterfly) 4 famous enterprise; well-known business 明星企业 míngxīng qǐyè famous (or well-known) enterprise
R.V. be bored to death See also mēnsǐ
verb excuse; forgive; pardon 得到原谅 dédào yuánliàng obtain a pardon 不能原谅的错误 Bù néng yuánliàng de cuòwù unpardonable mistake 我来晚了, 请原谅。 Wǒ lái wǎn le, qǐng yuánliàng. Please excuse me for being late.

noun 1 physics pressure (force) 大气压力 dàqì yālì atmospheric (or barometric) pressure 2 overwhelming force; pressure 外界压力 wàijiè yālì outside pressure 对某人施加压力 duì mǒurén shījiā yālì bring pressure to bear on sb. 在舆论的压力下 zài yúlùn de yālì xià under the pressure of public opinion 3 burden; strain 运输压力 yùnshū yālì strain on transportation

noun desire; wish; aspiration 主观愿望 zhǔguān yuànwàng subjective desire 良好的愿望 liánghǎo de yuànwàng good intention 从团结的愿望出发 Cóng tuánjié de yuànwàng chūfā start from the desire for unity 全世界人民的共同愿望 quánshìjiè rénmín de gòngtóng yuànwàng common aspirations of the world’s people
adjective not guilty; innocent 装出一脸无辜 Zhuāngchū yī liǎn wúgū pretend innocence noun innocent person
Not sure off of the top of my head

entry.defn: beginner; new hand
Language Exchange
idiom repeat another person's words like a parrot; parrot

entry.defn: noun natural resources; resources 资源丰富 zīyuán fēngfù abound (or be rich) in natural resources 开发资源 kāifā zīyuán tap (or exploit) natural resources 人力资源 rénlì zīyuán labour reserve 水产资源 shuǐchǎn zīyuán aquatic resources 野生动物资源 yěshēng dòngwù zīyuán wildlife resources
noun screen 电视屏幕 diànshì píngmù telescreen; TV screen

adjective 1 inclined to one side; slanting; leaning (opp. 正) 正东偏北 zhèngdōng piān běi east by north 这一枪打偏了。 Zhè yī qiāng dǎ piān le. That shot missed. 2 partial; prejudiced See 27810816偏爱pian1ai4偏爱 3 assistant; auxiliary 偏将 piānjiàng assistant general; adjunct general verb 1 not equal to; different from; diverge 偏低 piāndī on the low side 2 dated polite expression [indicating one has already had one's tea, meal, etc.] 谢谢, 我已经先偏了, 您请自己吃吧。 Xièxie, wǒ yǐjing xiān piān le, nín qǐng zìjǐ chī ba. Thank you, I’ve eaten already. Please have your meal. adverb wilfully; insistently; persistently 他偏不听。 Tā piān bù tīng. He simply won’t listen. 他为什么偏要那样做？ Tā wèishénme piān yào nàyàng zuò？ Why must he do it that way? 不该她去, 她偏要去。 Bù gāi tā qù, tā piān yào qù. She was not supposed to go but she insisted.
noun phraseology; term 商业用语 shāngyè yòngyǔ commercial phraseology 外交用语 wàijiāo yòngyǔ diplomatic terms verb choose words; wording 用语不当 Yòngyǔ bùdàng inappropriate choice of words; incorrect wording
1 theme 2 subject
verb give up all hope; despair 绝望情绪 juéwàng qíngxù feeling of despair; desperation 绝望的挣扎 juéwàng de zhēngzhá desperate struggle
noun Chinese character 简化汉字 jiǎnhuà Hànzì to simplify Chinese characters; simplified Chinese characters

noun power plant; power station 地热发电厂 dìrè fādiànchǎng geothermal power plant 水力发电厂 shuǐlì fādiànchǎng hydraulic power plant 火力发电厂 huǒlì fādiànchǎng thermal power plant 原子能发电厂 yuánzǐnéng fādiànchǎng atomic power plant

adjective complete; whole 他话没说完全。 Tā huà méi shuō wánquán. He didn’t give a full picture. adverb completely; fully; wholly; entirely; absolutely 完全不同 wánquán bùtóng totally different; have nothing in common 完全错了 Wánquán cuò le completely wrong 完全相反 wánquán xiāngfǎn exactly the opposite 完全正确 wánquán zhèngquè perfectly right; absolutely correct 完全有资格 wánquán yǒu zīgé fully qualified (or eligible) 完全彻底为人民服务 wánquán chèdǐ wèi rénmín fúwù serve the people heart and soul 他完全同意我们的意见。 Tā wánquán tóngyì wǒmen de yìjian. He fully agrees with us. 她完全不考虑个人得失。 Tā wánquán bù kǎolǜ gèrén dé-shī. She gives no thought to personal gain or loss.

adjective 1 independent; on one's own 独立分析问题和解决问题的能力 dúlì fēnxi wèntí hé jiějué wèntí de nénglì ability to analyse and solve problems on one’s own 2 separate; respective 这是两个独立的问题。 Zhè shì liǎng ge dúlì de wèntí. These are two separate issues. verb 1 stand alone 独立山巅的苍松 dúlì shāndiān de cāngsōng a solitary pine tree standing alone on a mountain peak 2 become independent; win independence 墨西哥独立于一八二一年。 Mòxīgē dúlì yú yī bā èr yī nián. Mexico achieved independence in 1821.
noun biographical notes; curriculum vitae (CV); résumé

verb 1 (of flowers) come into bloom; blossom; effloresce 栀子花在夏天开放。 zhīzihuā zài xiàtiān kāifàng. Gardenia blossoms in summer. 2 lift a ban, restriction, etc.; open 开放搞活 kāifàng gǎohuó open up and enliven the economy 开放对外贸易 kāifàng duìwài màoyì lift the ban on foreign trade 改革开放 gǎigékāifàng reform and open to the outside world 3 open to traffic or public use 开放边境 kāifàng biānjìng open the border 新建的港口已向外轮开放。 Xīnjiàn de gǎngkǒu yǐ xiàng wài lún kāifàng. The new port has been opened to foreign ships. 4 be open (to the public) 星期日图书馆照常开放。 Xīngqīrì túshūguǎn zhàocháng kāifàng. The library is open on Sundays as well as on weekdays. adjective outgoing; open-minded
verb camp; bivouac 出外野营 chūwài yěyíng go camping

noun 1 category 金属 jīnshǔ metal 2 biology genus 小麦和燕麦是同科的, 但不同属。 Xiǎomài hé yànmài shì tóng kē de, dàn bù tóng shǔ. Wheat and oats are of the same family, but of different genera. 3 family members; dependants 军属 jūnshǔ soldier’s dependants verb 1 be under; be subordinate to 所属单位和部门 Suǒshǔ dānwèi hé bùmén subordinate units and departments 这些厂属地方领导。 Zhèxiē chǎng shǔ dìfāng lǐngdǎo. These factories are run by the local authorities. 2 belong to 胜利终属我们！ Shènglì zhōng shǔ wǒmen! The final victory is ours! 我们两国同属发展中国家。 Wǒmen liǎng guó tóng shǔ fāzhǎnzhōng guójiā. Both our countries belong to the developing world. 西双版纳属亚热带气候。 Xī shuāng bǎn nà shǔ yàrèdài qìhòu. Xishuangbanna has a subtropical climate. 3 be 查明属实 chámíngshǔshí prove to be true after investigation 实属无理 shí shǔ wúlǐ be really unreasonable 4 be born in the year of (one of the 12 symbolic animals associated with a 12-year cycle) 她比我小一岁, 是属牛的。 Tā bǐ wǒ xiǎo yī suì, shì shǔ niú de. She is one year younger than I am; she was born in the year of the ox.

verb translate; interpret 翻译电码 Fānyì diànmǎ decode; decipher 笔头翻译 bǐtóu fānyì translation 口头翻译 kǒutóu fānyì interpretation 逐字翻译 zhúzì fānyì word-for-word (or literal) translation 这部书已经翻译成多种语言。 zhè bù shū yǐjingfānyì chéng duōzhǒng yǔyán. This book has been translated into several languages. noun translator; interpreter 担任翻译 dānrèn fānyì work as interpreter
noun traditional birth year according to a 12-year cycle, each year named after an animal See 29884928生肖sheng1xiao4生肖
noun monkey
verb look for 广搜例句 guǎng sōu lìjù search for examples extensively verb search 什么也没搜着。 Shénme yě méi sōu zhe. Nothing was found in the search.

adjective diligent; assiduous; industrious 学习勤奋 Xuéxí qínfèn be diligent in one’s studies 他一天到晚都在勤奋地工作。 tā yī tiān dào wǎn dōu zài qínfèn de gōngzuò. He buries himself in his work from morning till night.
idiom full of twists and turns (or ups and downs); with unexpected changes

catassign.category: IDIOMS, Phrases

entry.defn: verb cancel; call off; abolish 取消禁令 qǔxiāo jìnlìng lift a ban 取消决定 qǔxiāo juédìng rescind a decision 取消会员资格 qǔxiāo huìyuán zīgé deprive sb. of his membership 取消一次会议 Qǔxiāo yī cì huìyì cancel (or call off) a meeting 被取消比赛资格 bèi qǔxiāo bǐsài zīgé be disqualified from the contest 这个月奖金取消了。 Zhège yuè jiǎngjīn qǔxiāo le. There will be no bonuses this month.

verb express; convey; voice 表达群众的感情 Biǎodá qúnzhòng de gǎnqíng voice the feelings of the masses 表达人民的坚强意志 biǎodá rénmín de jiānqiáng yìzhì demonstrate the firm will of the people 充分表达思想 chōngfèn biǎodá sīxiǎng fully express one’s thoughts 我激动的心情难以用语言来表达。 Wǒ jīdòng de xīnqíng nányǐ yòng yǔyán lái biǎodá. Words can hardly express my excitement.
noun 1 badminton 打羽毛球 dǎ yǔmáoqiú play badminton 2 shuttlecock

adjective 1 take the initiative; do sth. of one's own accord; take the lead (opp. 被动) 主动帮助人 zhǔdòng bāngzhù rén willingly help others 争取主动 zhēngqǔ zhǔdòng try to gain the initiative; contend for the initiative 我们应主动派人去支援。 Wǒmen yīng zhǔdòng pài rén qù zhīyuán. We ought to voluntarily send people to help on our own initiative. 2 mechanics driving 主动轴 zhǔdòng zhóu driving shaft (or spindle) 主动齿轮 Zhǔdòng chǐlún driving gear
adjective not alike; different; distinct 不同意见 bùtóng yìjiàn dissenting views 趣味不同 qùwèi bùtóng have different tastes; varying tastes 在不同的程度上 zài bùtóng de chéngdu shàng to varying degrees

adjective whole; complete; total; all 全部开支 Quánbù kāizhī total expenditure 粮食全部自给 liángshi quánbù zìjǐ be completely self-supporting in food grain 要求赔偿全部损失 yāoqiú péicháng quánbù sǔnshī demand full compensation for the loss incurred 全部情况就这样。 Quánbù qíngkuàng jiù zhèyàng. That’s all there is to it. 他们全部是学生。 Tāmen quánbù shì xuésheng. All of them are students.
noun ringing of a bell

verb eat enough 吃不饱 chībubǎo go hungry 吃得太饱 chīde tài bǎo have eaten too much 我吃饱了。 wǒ chībǎo le. I’m full (up). 由于原料缺乏, 我们厂长期处于吃不饱状态。 Yóuyú yuánliào quēfá, wǒmen chǎng chángqī chǔyú chī bu bǎo zhuàngtài. Owing to a constant shortage of raw materials, our factory has been running under capacity.
noun sweet smell; fragrance; scent
noun river
1 to tie on 2 to buckle up 3 to fasten
verb (-//-) drip 水龙头在滴水。 Shuǐlóngtóu zài dīshuǐ. The tap is dripping.
lie down

verb 1 destroy; wreck; obliterate 破坏桥梁 pòhuài qiáoliáng destroy a bridge 战争破坏了很多城市。 Zhànzhēng pòhuài le hěn duō chéngshì. The war wrecked many towns and cities. 2 do great damage to; disrupt; sabotage; harm 破坏和平 pòhuài hépíng breach of the peace 破坏名誉 pòhuài míngyù damage sb.’s reputation 破坏人权 pòhuài rénquán violate human rights 破坏生产 Pòhuài shēngchǎn sabotage production 破坏团结 pòhuài tuánjié disrupt unity; undermine unity 破坏社会秩序 pòhuài shèhuì zhìxù undermine social order 3 change (a social system, custom, etc.) completely or violently overturn; reverse 破坏旧世界, 建设新世界。 Pòhuài jiù shìjiè, jiànshè xīn shìjiè. Destroy the old world and build a new one. 4 violate (an agreement, regulation, etc.); break 破坏治安 pòhuài zhì'ān break the peace 破坏停战协定 Pòhuài tíngzhàn xiédìng violate an armistice agreement 5 decompose; destroy (the composition of a substance) 维生素Ｃ受热过度就会被破坏。 Wéishēngsù C shòurè guòdù jiù huì bèi pò huài. Vitamin C is destroyed when overheated.
verb bleach
R.V. marry (a woman); get a wife
verb get up late; sleep in; sleep late

adjective true; reliable 确实的数字 quèshí de shùzì exact figures 确实的消息 quèshí de xiāoxi reliable information 把发生的事说得确确实实 bǎ fāshēng de shì shuō de quèquèshíshí give an accurate and detailed account of what has happened adverb really; indeed 他确实来过。 Tā quèshí lái guò. Yes, he did come. 他最近确实有些进步。 Tā zuìjìn quèshí yǒu xiē jìnbù. He’s really made some progress recently. 这确实是个很好的建议。 Zhè quèshí shì ge hěn hǎo de jiànyì. This is really a very good suggestion. 你听到爆炸声了？ ——确实听到了。 Nǐ tīng dào bàozhà shēng le？ —— quèshí tīngdào le. Did you hear the explosion? — Indeed I did.
pitch a tent
noun zoology kangaroo
noun signal 灯光信号 dēngguāng xìnhào light signal 识别信号 shíbié xìnhào identi-fication signal
to brainwash

verb firmly believe; feel convinced 她自信能赢。 tā zìxìn néng yíng. She believes that she will win. 我自信能够完成这项任务。 Wǒ zìxìn nénggòu wánchéng zhè xiàng rènwu. I’m sure I can fulfill the task. adjective self-confident; confident 缺乏自信 quēfá zìxìn lack confidence in oneself 有自信心 yǒu zìxìnxīn have self-confidence; confident (or sure) of oneself

adjective complicated; complex (opp. 简单) 复杂的心情 Fùzá de xīnqíng mixed feelings 使问题复杂化 shǐ wèntí fùzáhuà make things complicated; complicate matters 情况很复杂。 qíngkuàng hěn fùzá. The situation is rather complicated.
noun 1 dated scholar 2 holder of the bachelor's degree; bachelor

verb graduate; finish school 以优异成绩毕业 yǐ yōuyì chéngjì bìyè graduate with honours 还有一年, 他就大学毕业了。 Háiyǒu yī nián, tā jiù dàxué bìyè le. He’ll graduate from college next year. 他中学还没毕业就参了军。 Tā zhōngxué hái méi bìyè jiù cān le jūn. He enlisted before he had finished middle school.

verb rely on; be dependent on 依赖别人 yīlài biéren be dependent on others 工业和农业是互相依赖, 互相支援的。 Gōngyè hé nóngyè shì hùxiāng yīlài, hùxiāng zhīyuán de. Industry and agriculture depend on and support each other. 这个国家的石油完全依赖进口。 Zhège guójiā de shíyóu wánquán yīlài jìnkǒu. This country relies on imports for all its oil supplies.

pronoun 1 each other; one another 彼此呼应 bǐcǐ hūyìng support each other; act in coordination 彼此(之间)无话不谈 bǐcǐ zhījiān wú huà bù tán have no secrets from each other; intimate; very close 2 polite expression [used in reduplication as a reply] me too or you too 您辛苦啦！——彼此彼此！ Nín xīnkǔ la! —— Bǐcǐbǐcǐ! You’ve taken a lot of trouble. —So have you!
conjunction before this; originally 先是紧张, 继而惊恐 xiānshi jǐnzhāng, jì'ér jīngkǒng first nervous, then panic; first comes trepidation then fear
verb resign; hand in one's resignation 提出辞职 tíchū cízhí send in one’s resignation 准予辞职 zhǔnyǔ cízhí accept sb.’s resignation

noun regular college course; undergraduate course (opp. 预科, 专科) 本金毕业 běnkē bìyè graduate from a college (or university); graduate with a full college degree 开设本金课程 Kāishè běnkē kèchéng offer undergraduate courses
1 to practice 2 field work 3 to intern 4 internship

noun deposit; bank savings 定期存款 dìngqīcúnkuǎn fixed account 个人存款 gèrén cúnkuǎn personal savings account 活期存款 huóqīcúnkuǎn current account 提取存款 tíqǔ cúnkuǎn draw money (from a bank); withdraw savings (or deposit) 外汇存款 wàihuì cúnkuǎn deposit in foreign currency verb (-//-) deposit money (in a bank)
multi-platform (computing)
1 version 2 edition 3 release

noun function (of a machine, etc.); performance; property; behaviour 阻冻性能 zǔ dòng xìngnéng antifreezing property 反应堆性能 fǎnyìngduī xìngnéng reactor behaviour 这种电脑性能良好。 Zhèzhǒng diànnǎo xìngnéng liánghǎo. This kind of computer performs satisfactorily.
to binge-watch (TV)
1 plot leak 2 spoiler
R.V. 1 guess right; divine 我猜到他没有吃饭。 Wǒ cāidào tā méiyǒu chīfàn. I guessed he had not eaten anything. 2 predict
noun hunting knife
R.V. finish; complete
noun bomb
VARIANT OF 33875712压力锅ya1li4guo1压力锅 noun pressure cooker
noun dialect 次方言 Cì fāngyán subdialect 社会方言 shèhuì fāngyán social dialect
1 as much as possible 2 to the greatest extent

noun way; means; measure 尝试一切办法 Chángshì yīqiè bànfǎ try every means 用切实的办法来改进工作 yòng qièshí debànfǎ lái gǎijìn gōngzuò adopt effective measures to improve our work 找到克服困难的办法 zhǎodào kèfú kùnnan debànfǎ find a way to overcome a difficulty 借钱不是个办法。 Jiè qián bù shì ge bànfǎ. Borrowing money is no way out. 你说的办法可以考虑。 Nǐ shuō de bànfǎ kěyǐ kǎolǜ. What you propose is worth considering. 他办法很多。 tā bànfǎ hěn duō. He is resourceful. 我们总得想个办法把它完成。 Wǒmen zǒng děi xiǎng ge bànfǎ bǎ tā wánchéng. We must finish this by some means or other.
V.O. be vaccinated
1 next day 2 the morrow
part-time work

adjective exaggerate; overstate; be pompous 夸张的语言 kuāzhāng de yǔyán inflated language; bombast 你这样说未免太夸张了。 Nǐ zhèyàng shuō wèimiǎn tài kuāzhāng le. I’m afraid you’ve been exaggerating. noun rhetoric hyperbole 夸张色彩 kuāzhāng sècǎi hyperbole colouring 艺术夸张 yìshù kuāzhāng artistic exaggeration

noun originally; formerly; at first 原来我抽烟, 现在不抽了。 yuánlái wǒ chōuyān, xiànzài bù chōu le. I used to smoke, but not now. adjective original; former 原来的计划 Yuánlái de jìhuà original plan 他还是住在原来的地方。 Tā hái shì zhù zài yuánlái de dìfang. He still lives in the same place. adverb as a matter of fact; as it turns out; actually 原来是你呀！ Yuánlái shì nǐ ya! So it’s you. 这原来是个骗局。 Zhè yuánlái shì ge piànjú. It turned out to be a fraud. 你原来是这样的朋友！ Nǐ yuánlái shì zhèyàng de péngyou! So that’s the kind of friend you are!

noun colloquial childhood; youth 小时候, 我们常在一起玩儿。 xiǎoshíhou, wǒmen cháng zài yīqǐ wánr. We used to play together when we were young. 这是他小时候的照片。 Zhè shì tā xiǎoshíhou de zhàopiàn. These are his childhood photos.
verb eat so much that one feels sick; cloy
V.P. get into a free-for-all

entry.defn: verb 1 unload cargo 2 computing unload (a program, etc.) 3 figurative lay down a burden
verb 1 telecommunications upload (opp. 下载) 上传到服务器 shàngchuán dào fúwùqì upload onto the server 2 report to the higher authority 上传下达 shàngchuánxiàdá report to those above and transmit to those below
verb 1 computing telnet; register 2 internet log on; log in
verb smoke (a cigarette or a pipe) 抽一袋烟 Chōu yī dài yān smoke a pipe 你抽烟吗？ Nǐ chōuyān ma？ Do you smoke? 请勿抽烟。 qǐngwù chōuyān No smoking.
Sleep on ones side
1 attached externally (e.g. fuel tank) 2 plug-in 3 add-on 4 special software used to cheat in an online game
noun wedding day
1 to err 2 to dial a wrong number 3 to make a typo
verb tolerate; be lenient; bear with 能宽容持不同意见的人 néng kuānróng chí bùtóng yìjian de rén be willing to tolerate dissent adjective broad-minded; tolerant 他很宽容。 tā hěn kuānróng. He is easy-going.
adjective frightening 山洞又黑又深, 进去可真吓人。 Shāndòng yòu hēi yòu shēn, jìnqu kě zhēn xiàrén. Going into that deep, pitch-dark cave was really frightening.
V.P. toothache
to really hurt
R.V. unbearably hot

adjective colloquial 1 unbearably smelly; really lousy 这着臭死了！ Zhè zhe chòusǐ le! What a lousy move! 2 to death 累得臭死 Lèi de chòu sǐ be dog-tired 把他打了个臭死 bǎ tā dǎ le ge chòu sǐ beat him within an inch of his life
noun dialogue 南北对话 Nán-Běi Duìhuà North-South dialogue verb carry on a dialogue 两国政府已开始对话。 Liǎng guó zhèngfǔ yǐ kāishǐ duìhuà. The two governments have opened a dialogue.

noun state; condition; state of affairs 状态很好 zhuàngtài hěn hǎo be in good condition 固体状态 gùtǐ zhuàngtài solid state 心理状态 xīnlǐ zhuàngtài state of mind; psychology 无组织状态 wú zǔzhī zhuàngtài disorganized state of affairs
1 all-around 2 comprehensive 3 total 4 overall

adjective brilliant; splendid; wonderful 精彩的表演 jīngcǎi de biǎoyǎn brilliant performance 发言中最精彩的地方 fāyán zhōng zuì jīngcǎi de dìfang most interesting parts of a speech 这场球打得真精彩。 Zhè chǎng qiú dǎ de zhēn jīngcǎi. This is an exciting game.

verb it's hard to say; you never can tell 很难说谁对谁不对。 Hěn nánshuō shuí duì shuí bù duì. It’s pretty hard to say who’s right and who’s wrong. 他什么时候回来还很难说。 Tā shénme shíhou huílai hái hěn nánshuō. No one can tell when he will return.

noun physical (or bodily) strength; physical power 消耗体力 xiāohào tǐlì be a drain on one’s (physical) strength; consume (or sap) one’s strength 增强体力 zēngqiáng tǐlì build up one’s strength 他体力好, 打满五局击败对手。 Tā tǐlì hǎo, dǎ mǎn wǔ jú jībài duìshǒu. He had good stamina and beat his opponent at the end of the fifth game. 下半时队员们显得体力不支。 Xiàbàn shí duìyuán men xiǎnde tǐlì bù zhī. The players showed signs of tiredness during the second half.
verb pay back; return a loan
vocal concert

verb be understandable; be pardonable 他不大了解情况, 搞错了也难怪。 Tā bù dà liǎojiě qíngkuàng, gǎo cuò le yě nánguài. His mistakes are understandable since he knows so little about the situation. adverb no wonder; not surprising 难怪找不到人, 都开会去了。 Nánguài zhǎo bù dào rén, dōu kāi huì qù le. No wonder there is nobody here, they’re all at a meeting. 你吃得这么多, 难怪睡不好觉。 nǐ chīde zhème duō, nánguài shuìbuhǎo jué. When you eat so much, small wonder you don’t sleep well.
adverb sometimes; at times; now and then 那里的天气有时冷, 有时热。 Nàli de tiānqì yǒushí lěng, yǒushí rè. The weather there is now cold, now hot.
verb fire with a rifle, pistol, etc.; shoot 开枪射击 Kāiqiāng shèjī open fire 开枪还击 kāiqiāng huánjī return fire; fire back 朝某人开了一枪 cháo mǒurén kāile yī qiāng fired a shot at sb.
1 one of (sth) 2 one out of a multitude 3 one (third, quarter, percent etc)
verb hit the mark (or target); hit 打中要害 dǎzhòng yàohài hit on the vital spot; hit where it really hurts 打中一艘敌舰 dǎ zhòng yī sōu díjiàn hit an enemy vessel 没打中 méi dǎzhòng miss the mark
verb go down a slope; go downhill (opp. 上坡) 走下坡 zǒu xiàpō go downhill; be on the decline
noun coward
noun silver medal 获得银牌 huòdé yínpái win a silver medal
verb warm up; limber up
noun night shift (opp. 日班) 值夜班 zhíyèbān on night shift (or duty); do the night shift
noun day shift (opp. 夜班) 上日班 shàng rìbān be on day shift
Valentine’s Day
R.F. , coll. 1 casually 2 carelessly

noun knowledge; intellect 知识渊博 zhīshi yuānbó wide knowledge; erudite; learned 知识密集型产业 zhīshi mìjí xíng chǎnyè knowledge-intensive industries 技术知识 jìshù zhīshi technical know-how 书本知识 shūběn zhīshi book learning 跟这种没有知识的人议论严肃音乐本来就没有意思。 Gēn zhèzhǒng méiyǒu zhīshi de rén yìlùn yánsù yīnyuè běnlái jiù méiyǒu yìsi. There’s no point discussing serious music with such ignorant people.
verb loaf on the job; lazy
to fall asleep

verb waste; squander; throw away 浪费生命 làngfèi shēngmìng loaf (or idle) away one’s time 浪费时间 làngfèi shíjiān waste time; fritter away one’s time 浪费人力物力 làngfèi rénlì wùlì waste manpower and material resources 提倡节约, 反对浪费 tíchàng jiéyuē, fǎnduì làngfèi encourage economy and combat waste adjective wasteful; extravagant (opp. 节俭) 你这样花钱太浪费了。 nǐ zhèyàng huāqián tài làngfèi le. Spending money as you do is a waste.

adjective suitable; appropriate; becoming; right 你这样说不合适。 Nǐ zhèyàng shuō bù héshì. It’s not right (or suitable) for you to say so. 星期五对我最合适。 Xīngqīwǔ duì wǒ zuì héshì. Friday suits me best. 这个词用在这里不合适。 Zhège cí yòng zài zhèlǐ bù héshì. This isn’t the right word to use here. 这双鞋我穿着正合适。 Zhè shuāng xié wǒ chuānzhe zhèng héshì. These shoes fit me beautifully.

adverb no wonder; so that's why; that explains why 怪不得多一张票, 她把自己的让出来了。 Guàibude duō yī zhāng piào, tā bǎ zìjǐ de ràng chūlai le. So that’s why there’s an extra ticket. She has given hers up. verb not to blame 他来晚了, 这怪不得他, 因为开会时间通知错了。 tā lái wǎn le, zhè guàibude tā, yīnwèi kāihuì shíjiān tōngzhī cuòle. He’s not to blame for coming late to the meeting, for he was told the wrong time.

catassign.category: Grammar Words

entry.defn: verb lose 失去控制 shīqù kòngzhì get out of hand; get out of control 失去平衡 shīqù pínghéng lose balance 失去妻子 shīqù qīzi be bereaved of one’s wife 失去时效 shīqù shíxiào be no longer effective; cease to be in force 失去信心 shīqù xìnxīn lose confidence 失去作用 shīqù zuòyòng lose effect 失去自制 Shīqù zìzhì lose control of oneself; forget oneself 失去一切希望 shīqù yīqiè xīwàng be bereft of all hope 失去知觉 Shīqù zhījué lose consciousness 失去中国国籍 shīqù Zhōngguó guójí forfeit one’s Chinese citizenship

verb divorce 离婚理由 líhūn lǐyóu grounds for divorce 获准离婚 huòzhǔn líhūn get (or obtain, procure) a divorce from sb. 协议离婚 xiéyì líhūn divorce by consent 他们离婚了。 Tāmen líhūn le. They divorced (each other). 她跟他离婚了。 Tā gēn tā líhūn le. She divorced him.
verb delay; defer; postpone 展览会开幕的日期延迟了。 Zhǎnlǎnhuì kāimù de rìqī yánchí le. The opening of the exhibition has been postponed.
noun keyboard (of a computer, typewriter, or piano); fingerboard (of a stringed instrument)
noun 1 gravity; gravitational force 重力异常 zhònglì yìcháng gravity anomaly 2 gravity (of a celestial body) 地球的重力 Dìqiú dezhònglì gravity of Earth; gravitation
steering wheel
sneeze
verb vow; pledge; swear; take an oath 发誓忠于祖国 fāshì zhōngyú zǔguó pledge loyalty to one’s country 他们发誓要为死难烈士报仇。 Tāmen fāshì yào wèi sǐnàn lièshì bàochóu. They vowed to avenge the martyrs.
verb move; touch; affect 感动得流泪 gǎndòng de liúlèi be moved to tears 深为感动 shēnwéi gǎndòng be deeply touched
noun (children's) slide
verb dote on; spoil; bestow favour on 别把孩子宠坏了。 Bié bǎ háizi chǒnghuài le. Don’t spoil the child. 他太宠小女儿了。 Tā tài chǒng xiǎo nǚ'ér le. He dotes on his youngest daughter too much.
noun hall

noun music symphony; symphonic music
noun suburban district; suburbs; outskirts (opp. 城区) 郊区居民 jiāoqū jūmín suburban inhabitants; suburbanites

noun nostril 鼻孔朝天 bí kǒng cháo tiān turn up one’s nose at; look down one’s nose at; be cocky 掏鼻孔 Tāo bíkǒng pick one’s nose 一个鼻孔出气 yīge bíkǒng chūqì echo each other’s opinion; be hand in glove with; in collusion
1 to unblock 2 to dredge 3 to clear the way 4 to get things flowing 5 to facilitate 6 to mediate 7 to lobby 8 to explicate (a text)

verb pick up; collect; gather 捡粪 jiǎn fèn collect manure 捡柴火 jiǎn cháihuo gather firewood 捡垃圾 jiǎn lājī pick odds and ends from refuse heaps; collect garbage; remove waste 捡麦穗 Jiǎn màisuì pick up ears of wheat; glean a wheat field 捡煤核儿 jiǎn méihúr pick out unburnt coal from cinders 捡到一支钢笔 jiǎn dào yī zhī gāngbǐ find a fountain pen 捡了一条命 jiǎn le yī tiáo mìng barely escape death
toilet (room)
busy bee

verb 1 reappear; recur 2 repeat; duplicate 他一再重复自己的观点。 Tā yīzài chóngfù zìjǐ de guāndiǎn. He reiterated his views over and over again. noun repetition; duplication 避免不必要的重复 bìmiǎn bù bìyào de chóngfù avoid unnecessary repetition 写文章别太重复。 xiě wénzhāng bié tài chóngfù. Don’t be so repetitive in your writing. 任何历史现象都不会是简单的重复。 Rènhé lìshǐ xiànxiàng dōu bù huì shì jiǎndān de chóngfù. No historical phenomenon is a mere repetition of the past.
well-known phrase so that's how it is; so that's what's happened; I see

entry.defn: noun linguistics measure word; classifier (such as 个, 只, 次, 阵)
noun 1 single-storey house; one-storey house; bungalow (opp. 楼房) 2 dialect house with a flat plastered roof
noun 1 housemaid; housekeeper 2 (children's) nurse; childminder 住家保姆 zhùjiā bǎomǔ live-in baby-sitter
noun coincidence 他俩同年, 生日又是同一天, 真是巧合。 Tā liǎ tóngnián, shēngri yòu shì tóngyī tiān, zhēnshi qiǎohé. What a coincidence it is that they were born in the same year and on the same day.
adjective great; mighty; grand 伟大的胜利 wěidà de shènglì signal victory; magnificent victory 伟大的事业 wěidà de shìyè great undertaking

dialect adjective dirty 把脸涂得埋埋汰汰的 Bǎ liǎn tú de máimáitaitai de smear one’s face 看你那股埋汰劲儿, 不许你进屋。 kàn nǐ nà gǔ máitai jìnr, bùxǔ nǐ jìn wū. Look how dirty you are! You can’t go inside. verb insult; ridicule 埋汰人 mái tai rén insult (or make fun of) sb.
verb dialect 1 cook rice 烧了一大锅饭 shāo le yī dàguōfàn cooked a whole pot of rice 2 do the cooking; prepare a meal 自家烧饭吃 zìjiā shāofàn chī cook food for oneself

verb 1 leave (behind) 留下祸根 liúxià huògēn sow seeds of future trouble 留下几本书 liúxià jǐ běn shū keep a few books back 留下搏斗的痕迹 liúxià bódòu de hénjì bear traces of a struggle 没留下一儿半女 méi liúxià yī r bàn nǚ leave no descendents 2 stay (for) 留下吃晚饭 liúxià chī wǎnfàn stay for supper 把客人留下 bǎ kèrenliúxià detain a guest; make a guest stay 放学后留下 fàngxué hòu liúxià stay after school

noun memory 你们的深情厚谊将永远留在我们的记忆中。 Nǐmen de shēnqínghòuyì jiāng yǒngyuǎn liú zài wǒmen de jìyì zhōng. Your warm friendship will always remain in our memory. verb remember; recall 就我记忆所及 Jiù wǒ jìyì suǒ jí so far as I can remember
Blood alcohol percentage (血酒度 short version)

noun pride 民族的骄傲 Mínzú de jiāo'ào pride of the nation verb be proud; take pride in 父亲为儿子取得的成绩感到骄傲。 fùqin wèi érzi qǔdé de chéngjì gǎndào jiāo'ào. He takes pride in his son’s achievements. adjective arrogant; conceited 骄傲矜夸 jiāo'ào jīnkuā haughty and boastful 骄傲自满 jiāo'ào-zìmǎn conceited and self-satisfied; arrogant and complacent 骄傲使人落后, 谦虚使人进步。 proverb jiāo'ào shǐrén luòhòu, qiānxū shǐrén jìnbù. As conceit makes one lag behind, so modesty helps one make progress.
adjective transliteration mini; miniature
noun nightmare
verb gaze fixedly; stare 我久久地凝视着那尊铜像。 Wǒ jiǔjiǔ de níngshì zhe nà zūn tóngxiàng. I gazed at the bronze statue for a long time.
pug (breed of dog)

verb continue; sustain 保证经济的可持续发展 bǎozhèng jīngjì de kě chíxù fāzhǎn ensure a sustainable economic development 使国民经济持续稳定增长 shǐ guómín jīngjì chíxù wěndìng zēngzhǎng bring about a sustained, stable growth in the national economy 两国的文化交流已经持续了一千多年。 Liǎng guó de wénhuà jiāoliú yǐjing chíxù le yīqiān duō nián. Cultural exchange between the two countries has gone on for over a thousand years.
verb survive 洪水后只有少数人幸存下来。 hóngshuǐ hòu zhǐyǒu shǎoshùrén xìngcún xiàlai. Only a few survived the flood.

noun full marks 他考试得了满分。 Tā kǎoshì déle mǎnfēn. He got full marks in his examination. 体操比赛的满分是十分。 Tǐcāo bǐsài de mǎnfēn shì shífēn. The highest possible score in a gymnastics event is ten.
noun sleeping bag
noun seawater; brine; the sea
verb (of tide) rise (opp. 退潮) 正在涨潮。 Zhèng zài zhǎngcháo. The tide is at the flood. or The tide is rising. or The tide is coming in.

verb disappear; vanish; dissolve; die (or fade) away 消失在浓雾中 Xiāoshī zài nóngwù zhōng disappear in the dense fog 消失在人群中 xiāoshī zài rénqún zhōng be lost in a crowd 痛楚消失了。 Tòngchǔ xiāoshī le. The pain subsided.

verb drop; fall off (or away); come off 蕾铃脱落 Lěilíng tuōluò shedding of young bolls 毛发脱落 máofà tuōluò lose (one’s) hair 门的把手脱落了。 Mén de bǎshou tuōluò le. The door handle has come off. 墙上的油漆已经脱落。 Qiáng shàng de yóuqī yǐjingtuōluò. The paint on the wall has peeled off.

common phrase with nothing left 一锅饭吃得个精打光。 Yī guō fàn chī de ge jīng dǎ guāng. Not a grain of rice was left after the meal.

verb suit; fit 适合当地情况 Shìhé dāngdì qíngkuàng suit local conditions 适合他的口味 shìhé tā de kǒuwèi suit his taste; to his taste 她适合做教师。 Tā shìhé zuò jiàoshī. She makes a good teacher. or Teaching suits her. 这类野生植物不适合用作饲料。 Zhè lèi yěshēng zhíwù bù shìhé yòngzuò sìliào. These wild plants are not suitable for fodder.
noun dining hall; mess (hall); canteen 学生食堂 xuésheng shítáng student canteen (or mess)
campus
verb do all one can; try one's best 我们一定尽力支援。 Wǒmen yīdìng jìnlì zhīyuán. We’ll do our best to help.

verb 1 be defeated; lose (a war, etc.) (opp. 胜利) 失败之作 shībài zhī zuò box-office bomb 遭到了可耻的失败 zāodào le kěchǐ de shībài meet with ignominious defeat 2 fail (opp. 成功) 试验失败了不止一次。 shìyàn shībài le bùzhǐ yīcì. The experiment has failed more than once.
noun loudspeaker 低频扬声器 dīpín yángshēngqì woofer 高频扬声器 gāopín yángshēngqì tweeter
music bar; measure

To build muscle

adjective suitable; applicable 普遍适用的科技成果 Pǔbiàn shìyòng de kējì chéngguǒ scientific and technological achievements that are universally applicable 这项原则并非适用于一切场合。 Zhè xiàng yuánzé bìngfēi shìyòng yú yīqiè chǎnghé. This rule does not apply in all cases. 这种新的种植法对我区很适用。 zhèzhǒng xīn de zhòngzhí fǎ duì wǒ qū hěn shìyòng. The new method of cultivation is suitable for our area.

verb 1 have something to do with; have a bearing on; relate to; concern 有关全局 Yǒuguān quánjú have a bearing on the situation as a whole 这件事与他有关。 Zhè jiàn shì yǔ tā yǒuguān. He has something to do with the matter. 这些问题都跟哲学有关。 Zhèxiē wèntí dōu gēn zhéxué yǒuguān. All these questions relate to philosophy. 2 related; concerned; relevant; pertinent 有关部门 yǒuguān bùmén departments concerned 有关当局 yǒuguān dāngjú authorities concerned; proper authorities 有关方面 yǒuguān fāngmiàn parties involved 有关规定 yǒuguān guīdìng pertinent regulations 有关问题 yǒuguān wèntí related problem 有关组织 yǒuguān zǔzhī related organizations 阅读有关的文件 yuèdú yǒuguān de wénjiàn read relevant documents 保证有关国家的合法权利 bǎozhèng yǒuguān guójiā de héfǎ quánlì safeguard the legitimate rights of such countries as may be affected

adjective formal; official; regular 正式列入记录 zhèngshì lièrù jìlù officially place on record 代表团的正式成员 dàibiǎotuán de zhèngshì chéngyuán regular (or full) member of the delegation 大会于八月二十四日正式开幕。 Dàhuì yú Bāyuè èrshísì rì zhèngshì kāimù. The conference formally opened on August 24.
noun traffic accident; road accident 昨天出了两起车祸, 死伤四人。 Zuótiān chū le liǎng qǐ chēhuò, sǐshāng sì rén. There were two traffic accidents yesterday, with four casualties.

noun pattern; model; mode 经济∼ jīngjì ∼ economic pattern 文本∼ wénběn ∼ text mode
gamemode
noun giant; colossus
computing online username

adverb simply; sheer; at all 简直胡闹。 jiǎnzhí húnào This is sheer foolishness. 简直是浪费时间。 Jiǎnzhí shì làngfèi shíjiān. It’s a sheer waste of time. 天冷得简直连口水都能冻起来。 Tiān lěng de jiǎnzhí lián kǒu shuǐ dōu néng dòng qǐlai. It was cold enough to freeze the spit in one’s mouth. 我简直不敢相信自己的耳朵。 wǒ jiǎnzhí bù gǎn xiāngxìn zìjǐ de ěrduo. I could hardly believe my ears. 我简直不能想象有这种事。 Wǒ jiǎnzhí bù néng xiǎngxiàng yǒu zhèzhǒng shì. I simply couldn’t imagine such a thing. 这车修理以后简直跟新车一样。 Zhè chē xiūlǐ yǐhòu jiǎnzhí gēn xīn chē yīyàng. When the car was repaired, it looked as good as new. 这个星期简直没有一个好天。 Zhè ge xīngqī jiǎnzhí méiyǒu yī ge hǎo tiān. We’vehad no fine weather at all this week. 这消息简直好得叫人不敢相信。 Zhè xiāoxi jiǎnzhí hǎo de jiào rén bù gǎn xiāngxìn. The news is almost too good to be true.
verb disturb; trouble 对不起, 打搅您了！ Duìbuqǐ, dǎjiǎo nín le! Sorry to have bothered you. 人家正在工作, 别去打搅他了。 Rénjia zhèng zài gōngzuò, bié qù dǎjiǎo tā le. He’s working. Don’t disturb him.
karaoke

noun 1 times; age; era; epoch 电子时代 diànzǐ shídài age of electronics 封建时代 fēngjiàn shídài feudal times 开创一个新时代 kāichuàng yī ge xīn shídài usher in a new era 五四时代 Wǔ-Sì shídài days of the May 4 Movement 2 the times; our age; the day; the present era 时代感 shídàigǎn sense of the times 时代潮流 shídài cháoliú tendency of the day; trend of the times 时代的需要 shídài de xūyào needs of the times 时代精神 shídài jīngshén spirit of our age; spirit of the times; zeitgeist 跟上时代 gēn·shàng shídài keep abreast of the times; keep up with the times 反映时代的面貌 fǎnyìng shídài de miànmào reflect the features of our age 3 period in one's life 从青年时代到老年时代 cóng qīngnián shídài dào lǎonián shídài from youth to old age

verb form; make up; compose 组成统一战线 zǔchéng tǒngyī zhànxiàn form a united front 组成新的国务院 Zǔchéng xīn de Guówùyuàn form a new State Council 水的组成 shuǐ de zǔchéng the composition of water 每五个人组成一组。 Měi wǔ ge rén zǔchéng yī zǔ. Every five persons constitute a group. 主席团由一百四十八位代表组成。 Zhǔxítuán yóu yībǎi sìshíbā wèi dàibiǎo zǔchéng. The presidium is made up of 148 delegates.
adjective five-star 五星级旅馆 wǔxīngjí lǚguǎn five-star hotel
noun before dawn (or daybreak) 熬夜到凌晨 áoyè dào língchén stay up till the wee hours 七月三日凌晨 Qīyuè sān rì língchén in the small hours of July 3

noun get-together 他们每隔两个月搞一次聚会。 Tāmen měi gé liǎng ge yuè gǎo yī cì jùhuì. They have a get-together every two months. verb (-//-) get together; meet 老战友聚会在一起, 格外亲热。 Lǎo zhànyǒu jùhuì zài yīqǐ, géwài qīnrè. When old comrades-in-arms get together, everyone has a good time.
noun abbreviation = 21492992高级中学gao1ji2zhong1xue2高级中学 senior middle school; (esp. US) high school 职业高中 zhíyè gāozhōng vocational high school
N. classmate (same department and year) M: ge / míng / ²wèi / 个 / 名 / 位
noun speech; lecture 发表即兴演讲 fābiǎo jíxìng yǎnjiǎng make an impromptu speech verb give a lecture; deliver a speech
noun Europe

noun internal; domestic; home 国内贸易 guónèi màoyì domestic trade 国内市场 guónèi shìchǎng domestic (or home) market 国内新闻 guónèi xīnwén home news 国内形势 guónèi xíngshì domestic situation; internal conditions 国内治安 guónèi zhì'ān internal security 国内外形势 guónèiwài xíngshì the situation at home and abroad

1 research 2 a study M: 项xiàng [项] 3 to research 4 to look into

verb look to; count on 指望有一天能实现这个计划 zhǐwang yǒu yī tiān néng shíxiàn zhège jìhuà look forward to the day when this plan will be implemented 指望他长大了成为有用的人。 zhǐwang tā zhǎngdà le chéngwéi yǒuyòng de rén. We hope that he’ll grow up to make himself useful. 别指望他能帮你的忙。 Bié zhǐwang tā néng bāng nǐ de máng. Don’t count on him for help. noun prospect; hope 他这病还有指望吗？ Tā zhè bìng háiyǒu zhǐwang ma？ Is there still hope of his recovery? 救灾援助到了, 我们才有了指望。 Jiùzāi yuánzhù dàoliǎo, wǒmen cái yǒu le zhǐwang. The arrival of disaster relief brought us hope.
to lose
noun ham

verb 1 pass the night; put up for the night; stay overnight 附近的旅馆都客满, 只好到朋友家过夜。 Fùjìn de lǚguǎn dōu kè mǎn, zhǐhǎo dào péngyou jiā guòyè. All the hotels in the area are full. We’ll have to spend the night in a friend’s home. 2 VARIANT OF 21595904隔夜ge2ye4隔夜 of the previous night; last night
adverb perhaps; probably; maybe 他也许病了。 Tā yěxǔ bìng le. Perhaps he’s ill. 也许我不该告诉他的。 Yěxǔ wǒ bù gāi gàosu tā de. Perhaps I shouldn’t have told him.

verb 1 do mathematical exercise; do sums 2 count; hold; stand 个别情况不算数。 Gèbié qíngkuàng bù suàn shù. Isolated instances do not count. 我们说话是算数的。 Wǒmen shuō huà shì suànshù de. We mean what we say. 我们在国际上说话是算数的。 Wǒmen zài guójì shàng shuō huà shì suànshù de. We always live up to our international commitments. 这条规定仍然算数。 Zhè tiáo guīdìng réngrán suànshù. This rule still holds (or stands). 3 until 继续读课文, 记住了才算数。 Jìxù dú kèwén, jìzhu le cái suànshù. Keep on reading the text until you’ve learned it by heart.
noun brand; make 独家品牌 dújiā pǐnpái own brand 著名品牌 zhùmíng pǐnpái famous brand
pass time; spend time

adverb 1 [often used correlatively with 不管, 无论, etc.] in any case; at any rate; anyway 老王来不来还没决定, 反正小张一定来。 Lǎo wáng lái bù lái hái méi juédìng, fǎnzheng xiǎo zhāng yīdìng lái. Lao Wang hasn’t made up his mind whether to come or not; anyway Xiao Zhang is coming. 不管怎么样, 反正工作不能停。 Bùguǎn zěnmeyàng, fǎnzheng gōngzuò bù néng tíng. Come what may, the work must go on. 无论你怎么说, 反正我不答应。 Wúlùn nǐ zěnme shuō, fǎnzheng wǒ bù dāying. No matter what you say, I won’t agree. 2 since; as 反正得去一个人, 就让我去吧！ Fǎnzheng de qù yī ge rén, jiù ràng wǒ qù ba! Since someone has to go anyway, let me go. 反正路不远, 咱们就走着去吧！ Fǎnzheng lù bù yuǎn, zánmen jiù zǒuzhe qù ba! As it’s not far, we might as well go on foot. 反正你不是外人, 我也就不客气了。 Fǎnzheng nǐ bù shì wài rén, wǒ yě jiù bù kèqi le. Since you’re my friend, I won’t stand on ceremony.

noun item; project 项目立项 xiàngmù lìxiàng approve and initiate a project 项目核准与备案 xiàngmù hézhǔn yǔ bèi'àn project approval and record-keeping 出口项目 chūkǒu xiàngmù goods for export; export items 田径项目 tiánjìng xiàngmù track and field events 训练项目 xùnliàn xiàngmù training course 援助项目 yuánzhù xiàngmù aid project 基本建设项目 jīběn jiànshè xiàngmù capital construction project
noun customer; shopper; client 顾客至上。 Gùkèzhìshàng. Customers First. or The customer is always right.
noun wheel (of a vehicle)
electric motor
verb diagnose 物理诊断 Wùlǐ zhěnduàn physical diagnosis 医生诊断这病是胸膜炎。 Yīshēng zhěnduàn zhè bìng shì xiōngmóyán. The doctor diagnosed the illness (or case) as pleurisy.
playlist

noun experiment; test; laboratory work 做实验 zuò shíyàn do (or carry out) an experiment; make a test 化学实验 huàxué shíyàn chemical test verb experiment; test 用各种方法(进行)实验 yòng gèzhǒng fāngfǎ shíyàn experiment with various methods
noun mechanics hand lever; hand shank
noun teammate; fellow player
noun anatomy clavicle; collarbone 锁骨骨折 suǒgǔ gǔzhé clavicular fracture
verb medicine fracture 他摔了一跤, 右臂骨折了。 tā shuāi le yī jiāo, yòubì gǔzhé le. He fell and fractured his right arm.

noun 1 anatomy joint 指关节 zhǐguānjié finger joints 2 key (or crucial) link (or point) 应该注意那些涉及全局的重要关节。 Yīnggāi zhùyì nàxiē shèjí quánjú de zhòngyào guānjié. Attention should be centred on the key links that affect the whole situation. See 26472704买关节mai3guan1jie2买关节;31575552通关节tong1guan1jie2 通关节
1 contrary to what one might expect 2 actually 3 contrariwise 4 why don't you

verb defeat; triumph over; vanquish; overcome 战胜敌人 zhànshèng dírén defeat (or vanquish) the enemy 战胜困难 zhànshèng kùnnan overcome (or surmount) difficulties 战胜自然灾害 zhànshèng zìrán zāihài overcome natural disasters 甲队战胜乙队。 Jiǎ duì zhànshèng yǐ duì. Team A beat Team B.
noun 1 Chinese 2 foreign citizen of Chinese origin 美籍华人 Měijí Huárén an American Chinese
noun school uniform

adjective 1 (of a child) well-behaved; good 真是个乖孩子。 Zhēn shì ge guāi háizi. There’s a dear. or What a good child! 2 clever; shrewd; alert 学乖了 Xué guāi le become a little wiser; get smart literary verb perverse; contrary to reason; run counter to 有乖常理 yǒuguāichánglǐ run counter to reason; not make sense adjective (of character, behaviour, etc.) abnormal; odd
noun pet name for a child; childhood name (opp. 学名儿) 他小名叫毛毛。 Tā xiǎo míngjiào máomao. His childhood name is Maomao.
verb lose face; disgraced; embarrassed 这不是丢脸的事。 Zhè bù shì diūliǎn de shì. There’s nothing to be ashamed of. or This is not shameful.

verb 1 continue to have; retain 他还保留着年轻时的朝气。 tā hái bǎoliú zhe niánqīng shí de zhāoqì. He still retains the fervour of his youth. 这个地方还保留着原来的面貌。 Zhège dìfang hái bǎoliú zhe yuánlái de miànmào. The place still looks the same as before. 2 hold (or keep) back; reserve 保留以后再答复的权利 bǎoliú yǐhòu zài dáfù de quánlì reserve the right to reply at a later date 持保留意见 chí bǎoliú yìjian have reservations 无保留地同意 Wú bǎoliú de tóngyì agree unreservedly (or without reservation) 票给你保留到明天中午。 Piào gěi nǐ bǎoliú dào míngtiān zhōngwǔ. We’ll reserve (or hold) the ticket for you till tomorrow noon. 有意见都谈出来, 不要保留。 Yǒu yìjian dōu tán chūlai, bù yào bǎoliú. Say everything you want, don’t hold back.

adverb alone; by oneself; on one's own; singlehanded; independent 采取单独行动 Cǎiqǔ dāndú xíngdòng take independent action 单独一个人干不了这个活儿。 Dāndú yī ge rén gànbuliǎo zhège huór. Nobody can do this job alone. 她单独住一间屋子。 Tā dāndú zhù yī jiān wūzi. She has a room to herself. 我要和他单独谈一谈。 Wǒ yào hé tā dāndú tán yī tán. I want to have a talk with him alone.
verb dip in (ink, sauce, etc.) 蘸墨水 zhàn mòshuǐ dip in ink 大葱蘸酱 dàcōng zhàn jiàng scallions dipped in bean sauce (a favourite Shandong dish)
noun midnight; in the middle of the night 苦干到半夜 Kǔgàn dào bànyè burn the midnight oil 会议一直开到半夜。 Huìyì yīzhí kāi dào bànyè. The meeting went on far into the night.
verb jealous (or envious) of; envy; envious

pronoun each; every; various 各个厂矿 gègè chǎngkuàng each factory and mine 各个朝代 gègè cháodài every dynasty 各个单位 gègè dānwèi each unit 各个方面 gègè fāngmiàn all the various aspects adverb one by one; separately 各个解决 gègèjiějué resolve problems one at a time

noun insomnia; sleeplessness 经常性的失眠对身体极为有害。 Jīngchángxìng de shīmián duì shēntǐ jíwéi yǒuhài. A persistent insomnia is very harmful to one’s health. verb (-//-) suffer from insomnia 病人昨夜失眠。 Bìngrén zuóyè shīmián. The patient had a sleepless night last night.
1 at intervals of 2 every (so often)
noun efficiency 效率低 xiàolǜ dī inefficient 效率高 xiàolǜgāo efficient 这项革新使工作效率提高五倍。 Zhè xiàng géxīn shǐ gōngzuò xiàolǜ tígāo wǔ bèi. The innovation raised (or increased) efficiency fivefold.
efficient

verb 1 explain; explicate; expound; illustrate 说明理由 shuōmíng lǐyóu give reasons 说明真相 shuōmíng zhēnxiàng give the facts 说明机器的用法 Shuōmíng jīqì de yòng fǎ explain how a machine works 举例说明 jǔlìshuōmíng illustrate by examples 代表团认为有必要说明自己的立场。 Dàibiǎotuán rènwéi yǒu bìyào shuōmíng zìjǐ de lìchǎng. The delegation deems it necessary to state its position. 2 show; prove 他的话很能说明问题。 tā dehuà hěn néng shuōmíng wèntí. His words are very telling. 事实充分说明这种做法是正确的。 Shìshí chōngfèn shuōmíng zhèzhǒng zuòfǎ shì zhèngquè de. The facts show clearly that this procedure is correct. noun explanation; directions; caption 图片下边附有说明。 Túpiàn xiàbian fùyǒu shuōmíng. There is a caption under the picture.
noun crow's feet

adjective detailed; minute 详细的报道 xiángxì de bàodào detailed news report 详细地描述 xiángxì de miáoshù give a minute description 详细了解情况 xiángxì liǎojiě qíngkuàng acquire detailed knowledge of the situation 详细占有材料 xiángxì zhànyǒu cáiliào collect all the available material; have all the relevant data at one’s fingertips 请说详细点儿。 qǐng shuō xiángxì diǎnr. Please explain in greater detail.
noun pavement; sidewalk
adjective day-to-day; everyday; daily 这些都是日常必须用的东西。 Zhèxiē dōu shì rìcháng bìxū yòng de dōngxi. These are all the things needed for daily use.
noun 1 daily paper; daily 《北京日报》 «Běijīng rìbào» Beijing Daily 2 daily report 生产日报表 shēngchǎn rìbào biǎo daily extract
noun literature epic 史诗般的远征 shǐshī bān de yuǎnzhēng epic expedition
play with words; juggle with terms; paronomasia

idiom very impatient; unable to hold back; too impatient to wait; anxious to do sth. 他们都迫不及待地想知道发生了什么事。 Tāmen dōu pòbùjídài de xiǎng zhīdao fāshēng le shénme shì. They were impatient to know what had happened.

catassign.category: IDIOMS, Phrases

entry.defn: (photography) filter
noun incantation; invocation; spell; curse
noun greed; avarice; rapacity adjective greedy; avaricious; insatiable; voracious 他实在是贪心。 Tā shízài shì tānxīn. He is insatiably greedy.
ATTR. just come/arrived

verb (-//-) 1 lag (or fall) behind; retrogress (opp. 进步) 这孩子功课退步了。 Zhè háizi gōngkè tuìbù le. The boy’s not doing so well in his studies as he used to. 2 give in; make a concession noun room for manoeuvre; leeway 留个退步 Liú ge tuìbù leave some room for manoeuvre; leave some leeway
verb be (or become) pregnant

verb courteous work hard; go to great trouble; go through hardships 路上辛苦了。 Lùshang xīnkǔ le. You must have had a tiring journey. or You must be very tired after the journey. 同志们辛苦了。 Tóngzhì men xīnkǔ le. You comrades have been working hard. 这事恐怕还得辛苦您一趟。 Zhè shì kǒngpà hái děi xīnkǔ nín yī tàng. I’m afraid you’ll have to take the trouble of going there to see about it. adjective hard; strenuous; toilsome; laborious 犁地这活儿很辛苦。 Lí dì zhè huór hěn xīnkǔ. Ploughing is hard work.
noun transliteration talk show

verb dislike; loathe; be disgusted with 工人们很讨厌他那副官僚架子。 Gōng rénmen hěn tǎoyàn tā nà fù guānliáo jiàzi. The workers detest his bureaucratic airs. 他是个老油子, 谁都讨厌。 Tā shì ge lǎoyóuzi, shuí dōu tǎoyàn. He’s a wily old bird. Everybody dislikes his behaviour. adjective 1 disagreeable; disgusting; repugnant 讨厌的天气 Tǎoyàn de tiānqì abominable weather 每天刮风, 真讨厌！ Měitiān guāfēng, zhēn tǎoyàn! It’s been windy every day. What a nuisance! 他老说些个不三不四的话, 讨厌！ Tā lǎo shuō xiēge bùsānbùsì dehuà, tǎoyàn! He always says inappropriate things, really annoying! 2 hard to handle; troublesome; nasty 气管炎是很讨厌的病。 Qìguǎnyán shì hěn tǎoyàn de bìng. Tracheitis is a nasty illness.
1 guilty conscience 2 to feel a twinge of guilt
1 to delay 2 to put off 3 to procrastinate
if the family lives in harmony all affairs will prosper (idiom)

catassign.category: IDIOMS, Phrases

entry.defn: noun house-owner

noun auction 一场拍卖(会) Yī cháng pāimài auction sale verb 1 auction 交拍卖行拍卖 jiāo pāimàiháng pāimài come under the hammer; auction off 2 sell off goods at reduced prices; on sale 大拍卖 dàpāimài mark-down sales; clearance sales

verb 1 in progress; underway; proceed 大会明天继续进行。 Dàhuì míngtiān jìxù jìnxíng. The conference continues tomorrow. 工作进行得怎么样？ Gōngzuò jìnxíng de zěnmeyàng？ How are you getting on with your work? 勘探工作已经在进行。 Kāntàn gōngzuò yǐjing zài jìnxíng. Prospecting is already underway. 手术进行了六个小时。 Shǒushù jìnxíng le liù ge xiǎoshí. The operation lasted six hours. 2 carry on; carry out; conduct 进行表决 jìnxíng biǎojué put an issue to the vote 进行抵抗 jìnxíng dǐkàng put up resistance 进行侵略 jìnxíng qīnlüè commit aggression 进行经济封锁 jìnxíng jīngjì fēngsuǒ impose (or enforce) an economic blockade 进行科学实验 jìnxíng kēxué shíyàn engage in scientific experiments 进行实地调查 jìnxíng shídì diàochá make on-the-spot investigations; do a field study 进行英勇斗争 jìnxíng yīngyǒng dòuzhēng wage a heroic struggle 进行亲切的谈话 jìnxíng qīnqiè de tánhuà have a cordial conversation 进行一场激烈的争论 jìnxíng yī chǎng jīliè de zhēnglùn carry on a spirited debate 进行改革的探索和试验 jìnxíng gǎigé de tànsuǒ hé shìyàn conduct exploratory and pilot reforms 3 be on the march; march; advance
noun peach blossom

verb mind; take offence 菜做得不好, 请不要见怪。 Cài zuòdé bù hǎo, qǐng bùyào jiànguài. I hope you won’t mind my poor cooking. 批评得不对, 可别见怪。 Pīpíng de bùduì, kě bié jiànguài. Don’t take offence if my criticism is incorrect.

pronoun 1 others; person or persons other than the speaker or hearer 人家都这么说。 Rénjia dōu zhème shuō. That’s what everybody says. 人家都不怕, 就你怕。 Rénjia dōu bù pà, jiù nǐ pà. No one else is afraid. It’s only you who are afraid. 人家的事情咱们用不着管。 Rénjia de shìqing zánmen yòngbuzháo guǎn. We needn’t bother about others’ affairs. 别叫人家笑话你。 Bié jiào rénjia xiàohua nǐ. Don’t make the others laugh at you. 2 certain person or people [with the person or persons referred to in a near context, roughly equivalent to the third personal pronoun] 把信给人家送去。 Bǎ xìn gěi rénjia sòng qù. Take the letter to him (or her, them). 我问过好几个大夫, 人家都说这个病不要紧。 Wǒ wèn guò hǎojǐ ge dàifu, rénjia dōu shuō zhège bìng bù yào jǐn. I’ve consulted several doctors, and they all say that this illness is nothing to worry about. 3 [before a nominal expression, usu. with liveliness of feeling] 说干活, 咱们可比不上人家年轻的。 Shuō gànhuó, zánmen kě bǐbushàng rénjia niánqīng de. As for work, we can’t compare with those young people. 4 I; me [used rhetorically in place of the first personal pronoun, often playfully expressing displeasure] 你走慢点儿行不行, 人家跟不上啊！ Nǐ zǒu màn diǎnr xíng bùxíng, rénjia gēnbushàng a! Would you slow down? I can’t keep up! 原来是你呀, 差点儿没把人家吓死！ Yuánlái shì nǐ ya, chàdiǎnr méi bǎ rénjia xià sǐ! Oh, it’s only you! You almost scared me to death.
background music
verb 1 write music; compose 莫扎特五岁就开始作曲了。 Mò zhā tè wǔ suì jiù kāishǐ zuòqǔ le. Mozart began composing when he was five years old. 2 write music (for a song) 王芳作曲 Wáng fāng zuòqǔ music by Wang Fang

noun record; account 地方志中有关于这次旱灾的记载。 Dìfāngzhì zhōng yǒu guānyú zhè cì hànzāi de jìzǎi. There is an account of this drought in the local chronicles. verb put down in writing; record 详细地记载事情经过 xiángxì de jìzǎi shìqing jīngguò record the incident in detail 有文字记载的历史 yǒu wénzì jìzǎi de lìshǐ recorded history
1 rice ball (steamed rice formed into a ball and stuffed with various fillings) 2 onigiri (Japanese-style rice ball)
R.V. become tired from walking

noun form of address 工人中最流行的称呼是“师傅”。 Gōngrén zhōng zuì liúxíng de chēnghu shì “shīfu”. Shifu ( “master”) is the most popular form of address among workers. verb call; address 我该怎么称呼她？ Wǒ gāi zěnme chēnghu tā？ What should I call her? or How should I address her?
diary
1 screenshot 2 to capture an image displayed on a computer screen
1 snapshot 2 (computing) screenshot
noun frightening (or horrible) dream; nightmare 这一切犹如一场噩梦。 Zhè yīqiè yóurú yī cháng èmèng. The whole thing was a nightmare.
verb test; examine; check up 质量检测 zhìliàng jiǎncè quality control
verb form a phrase 组词造句 zǔcí zàojù form phrases and construct sentences; phrasing
1 rolled-up pastry 2 roll 3 turnover (patisserie)
noun sleep

noun balance; equilibrium 保持平衡 bǎochí pínghéng maintain one’s equilibrium; keep one’s balance 失去平衡 shīqù pínghéng lose one’s balance; in a state of imbalance 收支平衡 shōu-zhī pínghéng balance between income and expenditure; balance of payments verb bring into or keep in equilibrium; balance 逐渐在全国平衡工业布局 zhújiàn zài quánguó pínghéng gōngyè bùjú gradually distribute industry evenly all over the country 咱们组的计划还要跟别的组平衡一下。 Zánmen zǔ de jìhuà hái yào gēn bié de zǔ pínghéng yīxià. We’ll have to balance our plan with those of the other groups.
sports balance beam

adjective equal 平等待人 píngděng dàirén treat others as equals 平等待遇 píngděng dàiyù equal treatment 平等互利 píngděnghùlì equality and mutual benefit 平等协商 píngděng xiéshāng consultation on the basis of equality 男女平等 Nán-nǚ píngděng equality between the sexes 各国主权平等 gèguó zhǔquán píngděng sovereign equality of all nations 在平等的基础上 zài píngděng de jīchǔ shàng on an equal footing
Hacker/cheater
N. adult; grown-up ADV. , coll. all year; year after year V.O. grow up; come of age
verb scream; shriek; yell
idiom Many a little makes a mickle.

catassign.category: IDIOMS, Phrases

entry.defn: noun bill; check 服务员拿来了账单。 Fúwùyuán nálái le zhàngdān. The waiter came with the bill.
Ukraine
N. , coll. disc; record M: zhāng / 张
beanie
verb think of a way; do what one can; try 想法给大伙儿弄点儿水喝喝。 xiǎngfǎ gěi dàhuǒr nòng diǎnr shuǐ hē hē. Try to get some water for everyone.

1 identity 2 aspect of one's identity (i.e. sth that one is – mayor, father, permanent resident etc) 3 role 4 capacity (as in "in his capacity as a ..." 以…的身份x5yǐxx5deshēnfèn [以…的身份]) 5 status (social, legal etc) 6 position 7 rank
N. red lips

noun 1 partner 2 colloquial fellow; mate 伙计, 上哪儿去？ Huǒji, shàng nǎr qù？ Where are you going, mate? 他是我的老伙计。 Tā shì wǒ de lǎo huǒji. He’s an old pal of mine. 3 dated salesman; sales clerk; shop assistant; farm labourer
idiom lump (or jumble) together; confuse sth. with sth. else 把正义战争与非正义战争混为一谈 Bǎ zhèngyì zhànzhēng yǔ fēi zhèngyì zhànzhēng hùnwéiyītán lump together just wars and unjust wars
verb describe 难以描述 nányǐmiáoshù hard to describe; beyond description 详细描述事情的经过 Xiángxì miáoshù shìqing de jīngguò describe what happened in great detail; give a detailed description

noun discipline 纪律松弛 jìlǜ sōngchí lax in discipline; undisciplined job performances 纪律严明 jìlǜ yánmíng highly disciplined 劳动纪律 láodòng jìlǜ labour discipline (or regulations) 遵守纪律 zūnshǒu jìlǜ keep (or observe) discipline 无纪律现象 wú jìlǜ xiànxiàng indiscipline 加强纪律性 Jiāqiáng jìlǜ xìng heighten one’s sense of discipline

adjective skilled; practised; proficient 熟练地操纵机器 shúliàn de cāozòng jīqì skillfully operate the machine 熟练来自经验。 shúliàn láizì jīngyàn. Dexterity comes by experience. 他枪法很熟练。 Tā qiāngfǎ hěn shúliàn. He’s a good shot.

verb 1 handle; deal with; dispose of 处理国家大事 chǔlǐ guójiā dàshì conduct state affairs 处理日常事务 chǔlǐ rìcháng shìwù handle day-to-day work; deal with routine matters 必须严加处理 bìxū yánjiā chǔlǐ should be dealt with sternly 正确处理人民内部矛盾 Zhèngquè chǔlǐ rénmín nèibù máodùn correctly handle contradictions among the people 我处理完家务就来。 Wǒ chǔlǐ wán jiāwù jiù lái. I’ll come along as soon as I’m through with my household chores. 这事请保卫科处理。 Zhè shì qǐng bǎowèikē chǔlǐ. Please refer the matter to the security section. 2 treat sth. by a special process; process 热处理 rèchǔlǐ heat treatment 垃圾处理 lājī chǔlǐ garbage disposal 污水处理 wūshuǐ chǔlǐ sewage disposal 废物处理 fèiwù chǔlǐ waste disposal 文字处理 wénzì chǔlǐ word processing 数据处理 shùjù chǔlǐ data processing 用硫酸处理 yòng liúsuān chǔlǐ treat with sulphuric acid 3 sell at reduced prices; sell off 处理积压商品 chǔlǐ jīyā shāngpǐn sell old stock at reduced prices
R.V. foster; train; develop

adverb at (the) least 至少有一万人参加了大会。 Zhìshǎo yǒu yīwàn rén cānjiā le dàhuì. At least ten thousand people attended the rally. 他并不了解我, 至少是了解得不全面。 Tā bìng bù liǎojiě wǒ, zhìshǎo shì liǎojiě de bù quánmiàn. He doesn’t understand me, or at any rate not fully. 至少可以说, 这样处理不妥。 Zhìshǎo kěyǐ shuō, zhèyàng chǔlǐ bùtuǒ. This is not the proper way to handle the matter, to say the least. 他至少五十岁了。 Tā zhìshǎo wǔshí suì le. He’s at least fifty. 你虽然没有见过他, 但至少听说过他的名字吧？ Nǐ suīrán méiyǒu jiàn guò tā, dàn zhìshǎo tīngshuō guò tā de míngzi ba？ You haven’t met him, but surely you must have heard of him.
noun dim sum; light refreshments; pastry; snacks

adjective magical; mystical; miraculous; effective and startling 神奇的效果 shénqí de xiàoguǒ miraculous (or magical) effect 这些古代传说被人们渲染上一层神奇的色彩。 Zhèxiē gǔdài chuánshuō bèi rénmen xuànrǎn shàng yī céng shénqí de sècǎi. Through the ages, these legends have acquired an element of mystery and wonder.
R.V. become emaciated from hunger

verb prevent; guard against; forestall; avoid 防止交通事故 fángzhǐ jiāotōng shìgù try to forestall traffic accidents 防止骄傲自满 fángzhǐ jiāo'àozìmǎn guard against conceit and complacency 防止浪费人力 fángzhǐ làngfèi rénlì avoid waste of manpower 防止煤气中毒 fángzhǐ méiqì zhòngdú guard against gas poisoning
adverb time and again; again and again; repeatedly 一再宣称 yīzài xuānchēng declare time and again 一再表示感谢 yīzài biǎoshì gǎnxiè express one’s gratitude again and again
adjective unforgettable; memorable 难忘的岁月 nánwàng de suìyuè memorable years 难忘的一课 Nánwàng de yī kè an unforgettable lesson 当时的情景令人难忘。 Dāngshí de qíngjǐng lìng rén nánwàng. It was a memorable scene.
surfer
die of hunger; starve to death
verb replace; substitute for; take the place of 你要是自己不能去, 可以找个人来代替。 Nǐ yào shì zìjǐ bù néng qù, kěyǐ zhǎo ge rén lái dàitì. If you cannot go yourself, try to find someone to substitute for you.

noun original idea; real intention 我看这不是她的本意。 Wǒ kàn zhè bù shì tā de běnyì. I don’t think that’s what she really intended. 他本意是好的, 只是说话方式不对头。 Tā běnyì shì hǎo de, zhǐshì shuōhuà fāngshì bù duìtóu. He meant well, but said it badly.
noun 1 crescent (moon) 2 VARIANT OF 30735872朔月shuo4yue4朔月 astronomy new moon
noun road; street; avenue 逛马路 guàng mǎlù stroll around the streets; go window-shopping 马路两旁种了很多树。 mǎlù liǎngpáng zhòng le hěn duō shù. Many trees are planted on both sides of the streets.

noun 1 activity; manoeuvre 活动余地 huódong yúdì room for manoeuvre; latitude 政治活动 zhèngzhì huódong political activities 从事科学活动 cóngshì kēxué huódong go in for scientific pursuits 2 psychology behaviour verb 1 act; move about; exercise 活动一下筋骨 huódong yīxià jīngǔ limber up the joints; loosen up; warm up 站起来活动 Zhàn qǐlai huódong. stand up and move about 2 be shaky; unsteady 口气有点儿活动 Kǒuqì yǒudiǎnrhuódong sound less adamant; relent a little 椅子直活动。 yǐzi zhí huódong. The chair is rickety. 这颗牙活动了。 Zhè kē yá huódong le. This tooth is loose. 3 use personal influence or irregular means 替某人活动 Tì mǒurén huódong put in a word for sb.; use one’s influence on sb.’s behalf adjective movable; mobile; flexible 这样说话比较活动些。 zhèyàng shuōhuà bǐjiào huódong xiē. This is a more flexible way to put it.
1 animation 2 cartoon
noun vision; sight 视力好 shìlì hǎo have good eyesight 视力差 shìlìchà have poor eyesight 老人的视力衰退了。 lǎorén deshìlì shuāituì le. The old man’s sight is failing.
verb order (goods); place an order for sth. 订购一套家具 Dìnggòu yī tào jiāju order a set of furniture 欢迎订购。 Huānyíng dìnggòu. Customers are welcome to place orders. or Orders welcome.
noun exchange rate; conversion rate 汇率波动 huìlǜ bōdòng exchange rate fluctuation 汇率上扬 huìlǜ shàngyáng exchange rate appreciation 汇率下跌 huìlǜ xiàdiē exchange rate depreciation

adverb in reverse order; in an opposite direction 我把账目反过来又算了一遍。 wǒ bǎ zhàng mù fǎnguolai yòu suànle yī biàn. I added up the account items all over again in reverse order. 这话反过来说就不一定对。 Zhè huà fǎnguolai shuō jiù bù yīdìng duì. The converse of this statement may not be true. conjunction conversely; the other way round; vice versa 反过来也是一样。 fǎnguolai yě shì yīyàng. It’s the same the other way round. verb turn over
adverb at once; quickly; hurriedly 赶快去 gǎnkuài qù go at once 赶快！ Gǎnkuài! Quick! or Hurry up! 赶快跟我走。 Gǎnkuài gēn wǒ zǒu. Come with me at once.

noun group photo (or picture) verb (-//-) take a group photo (or picture) 合影留念 héyǐngliúniàn have a group photo taken to mark the occasion 跟老师合个影 Gēn lǎoshī hé ge yǐng take a picture with one’s teacher

verb 1 go over; pass by; go by 暑假很快就要过去了。 Shǔjià hěn kuài jiùyào guòqu le. Summer vacation is almost over. 一辆公共汽车刚过去。 Yī liàng gōnggòng qìchē gāng guòqu. A bus has just gone by. 你在这里等着, 我过去看看。 Nǐ zài zhèlǐ děngzhe, wǒ guòqu kànkan. You wait here; I’ll go over and see. 半小时过去了, 我一道题也没做出来。 Bàn xiǎoshí guòqu le, wǒ yī dào tí yě méi zuò chūlai. After half an hour, I hadn’t even finished one question. 2 euphemistic pass away 祖母昨天过去了。 Zǔmǔ zuótiān guòqu le. Grandma passed away yesterday.

verb 1 not allow; must not 不许说谎。 Bùxǔ shuōhuǎng. You mustn’t tell lies. 熄灯后不许说话。 Xīdēng hòu bù xǔ shuōhuà. No talking after lights out. 2 colloquial [in a rhetorical question] can't 何必非等我, 你就不许自己去吗？ Hébì fēi děng wǒ, nǐ jiù bù xǔ zìjǐ qù ma？ Why wait for me? Can’t you go by yourself?
1 severe 2 strict

verb train; drill 训练部队 Xùnliàn bùduì train troops 为外国人开设的暑期汉语口语训练 wèi wàiguórén kāishè de shǔqī Hànyǔ kǒuyǔ xùnliàn a summer course in spoken Chinese for foreigners 这些警犬都受过良好训练。 zhèxiē jǐngquǎn dōu shòuguò liánghǎo xùnliàn. All these police dogs are well-trained.
tiger cub
V.P. ride on the backs of; lord it over

noun 1 on one's body 身上穿一件白衬衫 shēnshang chuān yī jiàn bái chènshān wear a white shirt 我身上不舒服。 Wǒ shēnshang bù shūfu. I’m not feeling well. 希望寄托在青年人身上。 Xīwàng jìtuō zài qīngnián rén shēnshang. Our hopes are placed on the young people. 2 (have sth.) on one; with one 身上没带笔。 Shēnshang méi dài bǐ. I haven’t got a pen with me. 身上有零钱吗？ Shēnshang yǒu língqián ma？ Have you got any change on you?
1 to deceive 2 to coax 3 to amuse (a child)
noun knife and fork

verb (of a train) stop; (of a ship) berth 从上海开来的十四次列车停靠在二号站台。 Cóng Shànghǎi kāi lái de shísì cì lièchē tíngkào zài èr hào zhàntái. Train No.14 from Shanghai stops at Platform No. 2. 六艘万吨货轮可以同时在这座码头停靠。 Liù sōu wàn dūn huòlún kěyǐ tóngshí zài zhè zuò mǎtoutíngkào. Six 10,000-ton freighters can berth at this dock.
verb 1 literary foster cordial relations between states 2 dialect do good works

verb analyse (opp. 综合) 分析句子成分 fēnxī jùzi chéngfen parse a sentence 善于分析形势 shànyú fēnxī xíngshì be proficient in sizing up a situation 培养分析问题和解决问题的能力 péiyǎng fēnxī wèntí hé jiějué wèntí de nénglì cultivate the ability to analyse and solve problems 老师把这篇课文分析得很精辟。 Lǎoshī bǎ zhè piān kèwén fēnxī de hěn jīngpì. The teacher made a penetrating analysis of the text.

noun excuse; pretext 找借口 Zhǎo jièkǒu find an excuse (or pretext) 制造借口 zhìzào jièkǒu invent an excuse; cook up a pretext verb use as an excuse (or pretext) 别借口忙就放松了学习。 bié jièkǒu máng jiù fàngsōng le xuéxí. Don’t slacken your studies on the excuse of being too busy. 他借口另有约会, 提前走了。 Tā jièkǒu lìng yǒu yuē huì, tíqián zǒu le. He left early, on the pretext of having another appointment.
1 to slide 2 to roll
noun dust; dirt 掸掉桌上的灰尘 Dǎn diào zhuō shàng de huīchén dust the table 大风过后, 桌上落了一层灰尘。 Dàfēng guòhòu, zhuō shàng luò le yī céng huīchén. After the wind, there was a layer of dust on the desk.
verb cause physical or mental suffering; torment 受疾病的折磨 shòu jíbìng de zhémo suffer severely from a lingering illness 在狱中受尽折磨 zài yù zhōng shòujìn zhémo subjected to various torments in prison

noun accident; mishap 交通事故 jiāotōng shìgù traffic accident 责任事故 zérèn shìgù accident caused by negligence 防止发生事故 fángzhǐ fāshēng shìgù try to avert accidents 事故的原因还在调查之中。 shìgù de yuányīn hái zài diàochá zhīzhōng. The cause of the accident is still under investigation.
verb meet 我俩在美术馆偶然相遇。 Wǒliǎ zài měishùguǎn ǒurán xiāngyù. We ran across each other in the art gallery.
noun illustrative sentence; example sentence
persevere; stick it out
verb 1 guard the entrance; act as doorkeeper 2 look after the house
1 Benz (name) 2 Mercedes-Benz, German car maker

verb 1 catch the wind 帆破了, 兜不住风。 Fān pò le, dōu bù zhù fēng. The sails are torn and won’t catch the wind. 2 go for a drive, ride or sail; go for a spin 在河边骑车兜兜风, 很有意思。 Zài hébiān qíchē dōudōufēng, hěn yǒu yìsi. It’s fun to take a spin on your bicycle along the riverbank.
noun dated 1 son of a duke or ranking official; son of a feudal prince or high official 花花公子 huāhuāgōngzǐ playboy 2 courteous sb.'s son 张公子 Zhāng gōngzǐ son of Mr. Zhang
noun handsome man; very good-looking man
noun beautiful woman; beauty 美人迟暮 měirén chímù a beauty in her old age—regret at the passing of one’s prime
noun beautiful woman; beauty
Maserati
noun transliteration salad
verb be in one's hands; be in one's possession 到手的机会, 可别让它溜走。 dàoshǒu de jīhuì, kě bié ràng tā liūzǒu. Don’t let slip the opportunity.
N. , coll. car/vehicle in bad condition or of poor quality M: ³liàng / 辆
noun social relationship; connections 他人脉很广。 tā rénmài hěn guǎng. He is well connected.

adjective 1 wide; broad; vast; extensive (opp. 狭) 广为流传 guǎng wéi liúchuán spread extensively; widely known 见识广 jiàn shì guǎng have extensive experience 交游很广 jiāoyóu hěn guǎng have a large circle of friends 知识面广 Zhīshi miàn guǎng have a wide range of knowledge; very knowledgeable 她兴趣相当广。 Tā xìngqù xiāngdāng guǎng. Her interests are very broad. 这支小调流行很广。 Zhè zhī xiǎodiào liúxíng hěn guǎng. This ditty is very popular. 2 numerous 大庭广众 dàtíngguǎngzhòng before a big crowd verb literary expand; spread 以广流传 Yǐ guǎng liúchuán spread far and wide noun abbreviation Guangdong and Guangxi (广西 is not abbreviated to 广 except in the old term 两广 “the two Guangs, i. e. Guangdong and Guangxi”) 广货 Guǎnghuò Guangdong goods
noun San Francisco
noun train of thought; way of thinking 打断思路 Dǎduàn sīlù interrupt one’s train of thought 整理自己的思路 zhěnglǐ zìjǐ desīlù marshal one’s thought 她的思路很清楚。 Tā de sīlù hěn qīngchu. She thinks very clearly.
noun commerce; trade; business
noun dialect tycoon; mogul; ringleader

noun 1 stage; phase 阶段考试 jiēduàn kǎoshì progress test 过渡阶段 guòdù jiēduàn transitional stage 战役的最后阶段 zhànyì de zuìhòu jiēduàn final phase of the campaign 2 mining level 阶段高度 jiēduàn gāodù level interval
verb collect; gather 收集信息 shōují xìnxī gather information 收集邮票 shōují yóupiào collect stamps 收集民间验方 Shōují mínjiān yànfāng collect time-tested folk prescriptions

noun 1 tail 夹起尾巴逃跑 jiā qǐ wěiba táopǎo run away with one’s tail between one’s legs 夹着尾巴做人 jiā zhe wěiba zuòrén behave oneself; pull one’s head in; keep a low profile 2 tail-like part 飞机尾巴 fēijī wěiba tail of a plane 彗星尾巴 huìxīng wěiba tail of a comet 3 servile adherent; appendage 你为什么老做别人的尾巴, 难道自己一点儿主见也没有？ nǐ wèishénme lǎo zuò biéren dewěiba, nándào zìjǐ yīdiǎnr zhǔjiàn yě méiyǒu? Why do you always tail after others? Don’t you have any ideas of your own? 4 remaining (or unfinished) part; end 留尾巴 liúwěiba leave loose ends 5 one who shadows another; tail 甩掉尾巴 shuǎidiào wěiba throw off one’s tail See 28484096翘尾巴qiao4wei3ba5翘尾巴;31905024拖尾巴tuo1wei3ba5拖尾巴

verb apply for; file an application 申请破产 shēn qǐng pò chǎn file for bankrupcy; petition for bankruptcy 申请入党 shēnqǐng rùdǎng apply for Party membership 申请调动工作 shēnqǐng diàodòng gōngzuò apply for a transfer; ask for a transfer; ask to be transferred to another job 申请法律援助 shēnqǐng fǎlǜ yuánzhù apply for legal aid 申请入境签证 shēnqǐng rùjìng qiānzhèng apply for an entry visa 申请出境签证 shēnqǐng chūjìng qiānzhèng apply for an exit visa 申请注册域名 shēnqǐng zhùcè yùmíng domain name application and registration 向……申请 xiàng … shēnqǐng make an application to; lodge (or file) an application with; present a petition to
verb worship; adore 偶像崇拜 Ǒuxiàng chóngbài worship of idols; idolatry 她很崇拜她父亲。 Tā hěn chóngbài tā fùqin. She worships her father.

literary verb (-//-) summarize; make a synopsis of sth. 举要(=举其要者)述之 jǔyào shù zhī make a summary of what one has to say noun [often in a book title] essentials 古籍文献举要 gǔjí wénxiàn jǔyào selected works of classic literature; the best of the classics

noun 1 mechanics mechanism 传动机构 chuándòng jīgòu transmission mechanism 分离机构 fēnlí jīgòu disengaging mechanism 2 institution; organization; setup 国家机构 guójiā jīgòu state institution 金融机构 jīnróng jīgòu financial setup 科研机构 kēyán jīgòu scientific research institution 领事机构 lǐngshì jīgòu consular mission 民间机构 mínjiān jīgòu non-governmental institution 权力机构 quánlì jīgòu organ of power 商务机构 shāngwù jīgòu commercial organization 宣传机构 xuānchuán jīgòu organ in charge of publicity or information 政府机构 zhèngfǔ jīgòu government organization 外交代表机构 wàijiāo dàibiǎo jīgòu diplomatic mission 3 internal structure of an organization 机构重叠 jīgòuchóngdié organizational overlapping 机构庞大 jīgòu pángdà with unwieldy organizations 机构臃肿 jīgòu yōngzhǒng organizational overstaffing 调整机构 tiáozhěng jīgòu adjust the organizational structure

verb manage; operate; run; engage in 经营管理良好 jīngyíng guǎnlǐ liánghǎo soundly managed 经营管理落后 jīngyíng guǎnlǐ luòhòu backward operation and management 经营家庭副业 jīngyíng jiātíng fùyè engage in household sideline production 经营一家小店 jīngyíng yījiā xiǎodiàn run a small shop 统一经营 tǒngyī jīngyíng unified management 分散经营 fēn sàn jīng yíng decentralized management 发展多种经营 fāzhǎn duōzhǒng jīngyíng promote a diversified economy 改善经营管理 gǎishàn jīngyíng guǎnlǐ improve management and administration

verb 1 cooperate; collaborate; work together 合作经营 hézuò jīngyíng jointly operate; manage in cooperation 共同合作 gòngtóng hézuò cooperate with each other 南南合作 Nán-Nán hézuò South-South cooperation 2 co-author; compose jointly 这幅画是他们合作的。 Zhè fú huà shì tāmen hézuò de. This painting is their joint work.
verb pass through; cut across 穿越国境 Chuānyuè guójìng cross the border 铁路穿越原始森林。 Tiělù chuānyuè yuánshǐ sēnlín. The railway cuts through a primeval forest.
verb copy (by hand); transcribe

verb be close to adverb nearly; almost 将近完成 jiāngjìn wánchéng be almost completed 将近午夜 jiāngjìn wǔyè almost midnight 将近一百人 Jiāngjìn yībǎi rén close to a hundred people 该国有将近四千年有记载的历史。 Gāi guóyǒu jiāngjìn sìqiān nián yǒu jìzǎi de lìshǐ. This country has nearly 4,000 years of recorded history.

verb 1 establish ties; contact 他串联了几位工友, 组织起一个工会小组。 Tā chuànlián le jǐ wèi gōngyǒu, zǔzhī qǐ yī ge gōnghuì xiǎozǔ. He contacted several fellow workers and organized a trade union group. 2 electricity series connection (opp. 并联)
noun slipcase; book cover
verb dictation; transcription 教师让学生听写。 Jiàoshī ràng xuésheng tīngxiě. The teacher gave the pupils (a piece of) dictation.
1 narrow-minded 2 petty
verb disconnect; lose Internet connection

verb (-//-) take sth. or sb. seriously 谁都知道他爱胡闹, 没人跟他较真。 Shuí dōu zhīdao tā ài húnào, méi rén gēn tā jiàozhēn. He’s known for his horseplay — no one takes it seriously. adjective dialect serious; earnest 他工作顶较真的。 Tā gōngzuò dǐng jiàozhēn de. He is a conscientious worker.
skyscraper
adjective transliteration modern; fashionable 摩登家具 módēng jiāju fashionable furniture
verb live; reside; inhabit 少数民族住居的地区 Shǎoshù mínzú zhù jū de dìqū a region inhabited by ethnic groups
noun 1 VARIANT OF 74818730套间儿tao4jian1r5套间儿 a small room opening off another; inner room b apartment; flat 2 suite; apartment; flat 总统套房 zǒngtǒng tàofáng presidential suite
noun 1 apartment; flat; condominium 2 dated lodging house
idiom everything needed is there 日用百货一应俱全。 Rìyòng bǎihuò yīyīngjùquán. All varieties of goods for daily use are available.

catassign.category: IDIOMS, Phrases

entry.defn: verb enjoy together; share 共享胜利的喜悦 gòngxiǎng shènglì de xǐyuè share the joys of victory
noun computing flash memory disk; U-disk
noun hard (magnetic) disk
noun postbox; mailbox
